author: {'steamid': '76561198120567690', 'num_games_owned': 940, 'num_reviews': 136, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1526124579}
review:
[i]Eventide: Slavic Fable[/i] is an enchanting little hidden object game made by The House of Fables working under the well known developer/publisher team, Artifex Mundi who specialize in this genre. These kinds of games are simpler point and click adventures with scenes where we have to find certain listed items by clicking on them in order to progress, while also having adventure (item collection + combination) features. This particular one is centered around a unique fantasy/tale inspired park with strange creatures.

We play as Mary, a botanist who receives an urgent message from her grandmother asking for her help to save a rare mysterious plant in a heritage park (presumably in the US). Upon arrival we are immediately attacked by a huge batlike creature and it also kidnaps our grandma. The park is apparently full of mythical creatures and we'll need their help in order to save our grandma, the flower (that only blossoms at midsummer night) and to stop the evil magician who plans to abuse the powers of the park.

These kinds of simplistic storylines can be filled up with plenty of content and this is what [i]Eventide: Slavic Fable[/i] basically does. The exclamation on the steam store page - "Explore the exciting world of slavic legends!" - may sound a bit pretentious because as far as I know slavic nations are very diverse in culture and I'm not sure if this mythological world depicted here could be connected to them as a whole. For me the little creatures were distant and didn't find them as cute and likeable as the developers intended them to be. 

Still the game has one major redeeming attribute in this aspect and that is the beautiful magical forested area it takes place in for the most part (we also visit a medieval castle). This alone could carry the game on its own even if the other components were forgettable. But that is fortunately not the case, there's a fair amount of enjoyable (easy) puzzles to solve. Strangely enough there are actually less hidden object and fragmented object scenes than these minigames, but I didn't mind this, since personally I prefer creative minigames over HOs. 
The other thing to mention is the amount of items: there are so many of them to carry around that I sometimes had trouble finding use for them. At some locations I'm pretty sure I didn't use them or they just remained in my inventory, but I was still able to progress anyway. This is rather strange since generally in adventure and hidden object games items usually disappear after they have fulfilled their duty, that may occur after multiple uses sometimes.
As for collectibles we can search for bestiary cards (we can look up these creatures from our book/diary).
There's also a bonus chapter (which is always nice) which takes us back into our childhood where we can learn more about this special fern we managed to acquire in the main game. This time we have to heal our Mom using the magical healing properties of the flower.

The visuals are something I liked very much and while more recent HOGs have better graphics, the locations are simply amazing to look at. I love forests and since almost the entire game takes place in an eerie looking enchanting forest I absolutely loved it. I also liked how there was always something in motion in the backgrounds like falling leaves or hovering dragonflies. The menu with the interactive buildings on the main screen was also a nice touch.
The animations however were rather cheap and poorly done compared to what we usually encounter in Artifex Mundi originals like the ones seen in the [url=store.steampowered.com/bundle/2583/Nightmares_from_the_Deep_Collection/]Nightmares from the Deep series[/url].

Sounds and especially the very relaxing music are also strong parts of the game, it never gets irritating with some nice melodies here and there. It's as enchanting as the forest itself and fits the location and the mood of the game nicely. Some of the creatures are voiced by the same person, but I don't usually criticize a game for such things (I could even appreciate it when someone successfully provides their voice to many characters).

[i]Eventide: Slavic Fable[/i] is a charming example of its genre and while its plot is definitely not its highlight, the amazing environment and general atmosphere that surrounds it is great. The numerous minigames are also something to be praised even if they aren't particularly special to this genre. All in all it's a well above average hidden object game and if you like forests and HOGs, look no further.

PROS
+ fantastic locations and atmosphere, beautiful scenery
+ more minigames, less HOG scenes
+ nice bonus chapter
+ fitting, relaxing music

CONS
- simple plot contrary to what the slavic theme could offer
- character animations are poor
- the creatures feel awkward

RATING
7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198017736253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1694738080}
review:
I really wanted to like this game. It's not horrible, or bad. But bottom line, aside from the graphics, it didn't do anything else very good

Pros:
* Nice graphics. Better than your average hidden-object game. With actual cut-scenes and even some animation
* The hidden objects mechanics that pops-up every now and then is rather nice, and forces you to be observant

Cons:
* Puzzles are a tad too easy. When they're not, there's probably some pixel hunting involved
* Story is *meh*. Storyline is basic to non-existent
* No "slavic fable" anything involved, so if you were expecting that, this is not the game you were looking for

It's not a great game, but if you want to pass a couple of hours this might be for you (and even then, please try to buy it on sale, because because you'd be angry for the full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032596719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1567887636}
review: Very odd story.  I'm not Slavic and have no ties to the culture at all so I have no way of saying "YEAH, totally true to tradition!"  In fact, it's weird that they haven't been tagged for singling out a culture in a game title in these paralytically PC times.  Still, an enjoyable if not particularly memorable way to pass time if you find it on sale and not many games left to play in your library on a lazy weekend day.  Definitely one to put on the wish list until it's on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3718, 'playtime_forever': 9427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9427, 'last_played': 1645174612}
review:
游戏以其独特的斯拉夫神话背景和引人入胜的游戏机制，吸引了众多玩家的关注。在这款游戏中，玩家将踏入一个充满神秘与奇幻的斯拉夫世界，展开一段难忘的冒险之旅。

首先从游戏的画面和音效来看表现堪称出色。游戏采用了精美细腻的画面风格，将斯拉夫神话中的奇幻元素展现得淋漓尽致。无论是神秘莫测的森林、古老庄严的城堡，还是奇幻瑰丽的魔法效果，都令人目不暇接。同时游戏的音效也十分到位，逼真的环境音效和悠扬的背景音乐为游戏增添了不少氛围。

在玩法方面以解谜为核心，通过丰富的场景和谜题设计，为玩家带来了极具挑战性的游戏体验。游戏中的谜题类型多样，既有需要观察与推理的逻辑谜题，也有需要运用想象力和创造力的创意谜题。这些谜题不仅考验玩家的智力，还使得游戏过程充满了趣味性和探索性。

除了精彩的解谜机制外，游戏还融入了丰富的剧情元素。玩家在探索的过程中，将逐渐揭开隐藏在斯拉夫神话背后的秘密，感受到游戏世界的深度和魅力。剧情发展扣人心弦，让人沉浸其中，无法自拔。

然而尽管在画面、音效和玩法等方面表现出色，但仍然存在一些不足之处。首先游戏的难度设置可能有些偏高，对于新手玩家来说可能会感到有些吃力。一些谜题的设计过于复杂，需要玩家花费较长的时间和精力来解开。这可能会让一些玩家在解谜的过程中感到挫败和失去兴趣。

其次游戏中的部分操作体验也有待提升。在某些关键时刻，控制方式的响应速度不够快，导致玩家无法及时做出反应。这可能会影响到游戏的流畅度和玩家的游戏体验。

此外游戏的流程长度可能略显短促，对于喜欢长时间投入游戏的玩家来说可能会感到不够满足。希望开发者能够在后续更新中增加更多的解谜内容和剧情线索，让玩家能够更深入地探索游戏世界。

综上所述，这是一款在画面、音效和玩法等方面表现出色的冒险解谜游戏。它以独特的斯拉夫神话背景和引人入胜的游戏机制为玩家带来了一段难忘的冒险之旅。然而在难度设置、操作体验和流程长度等方面仍有一些不足之处。

author: {'steamid': '76561198049498441', 'num_games_owned': 5263, 'num_reviews': 448, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1569343063}
review:
잘 만든 포인트 앤 클릭 게임
슬라브 신화에 나오는 생물들이 나와서 슬라브 신화에 관심도 가게 되어있네요.
미스터리와 퍼즐의 적절한 조화, 포인트 앤 클릭에 적절한 볼륨과 퀄리티를 가지고 있습니다.

같은 배급사에서 나온 Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek 의 이그터 에그도 첫 자동차에 나옵니다 ㅋㅋ

스토리라인도 거의 비슷합니다.

왜 이런 스토리는 수상한 사람이 버젓이 있는데도 순진하게 항상 뒤통수를 맞게 될까요 
고통의 연속입니다.

미스터리는 뒤통수가 함께 해야 재밌나봅니다.
물건을 찾는 퀴즈가 상당히 억지인 경우도 있지만 재미있습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029608584', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 517, 'last_played': 1568843269}
review:
A nice quick casual game. Special interest, if you ask me. The story is okay: Not too exciting, but not too boring either.
Achievement-wise the BOOKWORM one is a bit annoying, since it's easy to miss one freakin' note (I missed the last one on the final screen because I finished the game prematurely).

Unfortunately again a 2nd playthrough is required in Expert mode.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091958907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1567711752}
review:
Definitely recommend!

Pros:
.Engaging story
.Well done atmosphere
.Lovely clean, crisp artwork/graphics/scenes
.Enhancing music/sounds/voice acting
.Three difficulty modes (no custom)
.Mini-map with fast travel (receive in-game)
.Lockable toolbar
.Object glows when in place for possible use
.Intricate, challenging adventure play 
.Variety of hidden object scenes
.Variety of mini-puzzles
,Collectables (flowers and cards)
.Bonus chapter

Cons
.Mini-map indicated areas, not individual scenes
.Reused hidden object scenes
.Easy mini-puzzles
,Short

Final words (8/10):
This was the first game I played in this genre and it reeled me right in.  I replayed the game to do this review and still found it to be a delightful experience, well worth the time and money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102924698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1566354745}
review: Good game, really liked it. Very interesting story, game play flowed well. Only issue was that in Casual mode, puzzles were too easy or too hard, there was nothing in the middle. Would play again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101776626', 'num_games_owned': 5243, 'num_reviews': 459, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1565914799}
review:
A bit disappointed by this one, the problem wasn't the story it was how far stretched the Hidden Object scenes were. I played in Expert and there were some point I had to use the hint to know where I was suppose to go next.
For example, when you go to the dungeon, if you click on the torture tools on the left, she makes a comment, then at some point it suddenly becomes a Hidden Object scene. The same happens with some stairs you cannot access to all along the game, except at the very end.
Expect as well to keep the items at 2/3 or simply having them in your inventory for really really long before finding their use.
There were also weird descriptions of what you need. When the character says that she needs something "heavy" to break an already half wrecked lid, my thought is to use the helmet I just got, not the pickaxe that I'll get at least 30mn and a lot of scenes after.
Speaking of the Pickaxe, it feels like it's the most powerful item of the game.. Or they just gave up after so long, so you use the pickaxe to recover a piece of relief that I would consider as fragile, unstuck something under a wheel and finally break the damn lid.
I really hope that the next one will be better on that side, I never felt so lost or had this many troubles to understand which tool I was supposed to use.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996273719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 798, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1565194308}
review:
[h1] Information [/h1]

EVENTIDE: SLAVIC FABLE ist ein Wimmelbild-Abenteuer, welches von House of Fables entwickelt wurde.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

In "Eventide: Slawische Fabel" erkundest du einen verwunschenen Wald voller Geheimnisse, in dem die wundersamen Wesen der slawischen Mythologie vor deinen Augen zum Leben erwachen! Du musst einen bösen Magier aufhalten, bevor er seine finsteren Pläne verwirklichen kann - doch dabei brauchst du die Hilfe des Waldes und seiner zauberhaften Bewohner!

[h1] Pro [/h1]

+ fesselnde Geschichte
+ schöne, animierte Zwischenszenen
+ teils anspruchsvolle Rätsel 
+ solider Grafikstil 
+ guter Sound
+ Atemberaubende Hintergrundbilder
+ Bonusabenteuer mit spannender Geschichte
+ Integriertes Handbuch
+ 2 Schwierigkeitsgrade
+ Hilfefunktion
+ Trading Cards und Errungenschaften

[h1] Kontra [/h1]

- kurze Spielzeit von 4 Stunden

[h1] Fazit [/h1]

EVENTIDE: SLAVIC FABLE  überzeugt durch die liebevolle Gestaltung der Hintergrundbilder und einer fesselnden Geschichte. Die Vertonung wird dich begeistern und sorgt für eine mitreißende Stimmung. Klare Kaufempfehlung für Fans dieses Genres.

PS:  In dieser Gruppe https://steamcommunity.com/groups/hoi4deu findest du mehr gute Reviews von mir, dort könnt ihr mir auch Folgen, [Kuratorseite].

author: {'steamid': '76561198036328736', 'num_games_owned': 3959, 'num_reviews': 727, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1565260985}
review:
Ce premier opus de la série [i]Eventide[/i] est une réelle déception à laquelle les jeux estampillés [i]Artifex Mundi[/i] nous ont peu habitués.


[h1]Scénario[/h1]
Mary, l'héroïne, est invitée par sa grand-mère qui gère un parc pour l'aider à sauver une plante rare qui dépérit. Evidemment, rien ne va se passer comme prévu. A peine arrivée à destination, Mary va être victime d'un accident de voiture, combattre l'incendie qui ravage la maison de son aïeule et être témoin impuissante de l'enlèvement de celle-ci.

Un très court chapitre bonus propose une autre histoire dans les mêmes lieux.


[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
HOG classique dans lequel on doit trouver des objets à utiliser ensuite au bon endroit, résoudre quelques puzzles et SOC et éventuellement collecter des objets facultatifs.
Il possède naturellement tous les éléments habituels : inventaire, journal, carte, 3 niveaux de difficulté, système d'aide.


[h1]Points positifs[/h1]
La réalisation est soignée tant techniquement qu'artistiquement.

Beaucoup d'objets à trouver et utiliser.

Des SOC qui misent moins sur la quantité que sur la diversité.


[h1]Points négatifs[/h1]
Le scénario est décevant car non seulement il n'évoque les [i]fables slaves[/i] que de manière très anecdotique...

... mais il passe aussi bien vite au second plan pour ne demeurer qu'un vague prétexte pour justifier la progression en nos rappelant qu'on doit aller délivrer la grand-mère.

Le jeu manque terriblement d'originalité et propose des situations, des énigmes et des mini-jeux déjà vus et revus, y compris la plupart des clichés malheureusement trop fréquent dans les jeux du genre.

La difficulté est totalement absente, y compris en difficulté max.

La durée de vie est ridiculement courte, même pour un HOG : moins de 3h pour l'aventure principale et pas plus de 30min pour le chapitre bonus (en difficulté max).


[h1]En bref[/h1]
Les fanatiques absolus du genre y trouveront peut-être leur compte s'ils acquièrent le titre en soldes. 
Quant aux autres joueurs, ils déploreront l'absence de difficulté, la manque de contenu et les limites du scénario et estimeront  que ce jeu est loin d'être indispensable dans leur bibliothèque.

Pour moi, le jeu cumule trop de lacunes. Une aventure peut être courte si elle est intense, un scénario un peu léger compensé par des défis difficiles ou des énigmes manquants de challenge acceptées grâce à une histoire prenante ou un contenu important.


[i]Eventide : Slavic Fable[/i] n'échappe donc pas au pouce rouge.



[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036328736/recommended/510650/]Voir aussi mon évaluation de [i]Eventide 2 : Sorcerer's Mirror[/i][/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198036328736/recommended/677020/]Voir aussi mon évaluation de [i]Eventide 3 : Legacy of Legends[/i][/url]

review: This was a great game, and I really enjoyed it.  The graphics are appealing and the game flows really nicely. author: {'steamid': '76561198326064150', 'num_games_owned': 4851, 'num_reviews': 228, 'playtime_forever': 303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1609383248}
review:
他家的解密游戏我玩儿的真不少，这样一部还算是不错的。
寻物解密的地方比较多，大多是找东西按东西，玩儿着玩儿着会有点无聊。（有的地方挺迷的，不过你看他用品的介绍基本上都能猜出来是干啥的。）
音乐不错我喜欢，场景也是依旧的和我口味。（小动物超可爱鸭！）
剧情设计上也不错，就是boss习惯性眼瞎。
总体：8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197978350645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1554261834}
review: Very nice traditional hidden object game, on par with the usual level of quality we have come to expect from Artifex Mundi. There is nothing new here that you haven't already seen in a dozen other HOGs, but really all one can reasonably expect from this type of game is that the artwork in attractive, and that the gameplay unfolds in a somewhat logical way so that you are not constantly having to spam the hint button to figure out what to do next, and Eventide succeeds on both counts.

review: I like the game generally but the map is insufficient. When you click the exclamation mark on the map, it takes you to the entrance of the marked area and you have to find your way through it yourself. It would be better to supply the player with a more detailed map.  As a player, I do not want to spend time to find where the action is. I'd rather just click and go to the target place.

author: {'steamid': '76561198866097728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1550939657}
review: 第一款通关的解谜游戏。画面不错，剧情推进合理，难度适中，不会因为太难而导致放弃。小游戏挺好玩的，就是找物品的小游戏相对而言多了些。

author: {'steamid': '76561198038570229', 'num_games_owned': 515, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1550979788}
review:
edit: I forgot to mention that I literally fell asleep playing this game, and because I slept past where I could return it, I just had to finish it. 

So I really enjoy hidden object games. I find them super soothing, and fun, and usually there's some pretty nice art. This game... is definitely on the lower end of hidden object games. Firstly, there's very few, if ANY, references to Slavic lore, past your grandmother being hamfistedly nicknamed 'Baba'. Second, there's very few actual hidden object puzzles in the game, and the ones that are there are extremely easy. There's very few puzzles, and no puzzles that took me more than 2 minutes to do. Most of the 'puzzles' in the game were needless backtracking to try to figure out what in the world the game wanted me to do. The story is extremely weak as well--I won't spoil anything in case you are, for whatever reason, extremely invested, but the 'villain's' backstory is... so stupid. It's so dumb. The voice acting is way more jilted than any other Artifex Mundi game I've played, and there's typos galore, a couple of which actually got read aloud! Go play Grim Legends or the Davy Jones series. The puzzles are pretty much just copies of eachother, but at least they're competent copies with slightly interesting plots. 

The stupidest puzzle I encountered was one where I had to tie a magnet to a stick and string (but not a piece of rope I had earlier) in order to fish a puzzle piece... out of an open cage that I could clearly reach into. To be fair, there was a skeleton in the cage, so maybe she just didn't want to touch it?

Oh also there's a power outlet in the STONE WALL of the MEDIEVAL CASTLE. How in the world did they install that. Extra extra points for it involving a puzzle where you plug in a fan near a wet surface. 'Cause [i]that's[/i] not an electrical hazard at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075326292', 'num_games_owned': 291, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1671932961}

author: {'steamid': '76561198128155100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1550764032}
review: I love adventure point and click games.  So simple, yet so relaxing and fun.  The graphics take you to another world altogether, similarly with the music.  The plot is simple, but clever and when I want to escape into a world of my own, cut off from the everyday hassle of work, these games are the best solution.  Secondly, I support Artifex Mundi because they're Polish, so I like them and want them to succeed on an international scale :D

review: The Eventide series focuses on Slavic Mythology mixed with a modern setting and the first game in the series is fairly promising. Overall, it's another typical Hidden Object game but it did seem there fewer hidden object scenes here than in other similar games I've played. It's also rather unimpressive visually for a game that's still relatively recent. As always though, it's still an enjoyable time and absolutely worth a try if you can get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198269060330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1548505525}
review:
I had been eyeing off the Eventide series for quite some time and I am so glad I finally bought the bundle at the last sale, because it started off so well! Eventide: Slavic Fable was beautifully drawn, great music, interesting (variety and easy) puzzles, and the story was pretty good too. I also enjoyed that most of the mechanics seemed to make logical sense most of the time, so only in a couple of instances did I end up wondering around aimlessly trying to find the thing to set off the next thing.

The achievements were fairly easy to get as most of them are earned as you progress through the story. That being said, I did have to go through it again for the cards and the bookworm achievements, as I missed the very (very) last ones after getting caught up in the excitement of the story.

I definitely recommend this for lovers of point-and-click adventures and those into fairytales or mythical beasts. I am looking forward to playing through the next two in the series!

author: {'steamid': '76561198354715942', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1547785746}
review: I like that the game was a combinaton of puzzle solving and hidden object activites. It seemed to short, and I wish there was more that would describe the mythological creatures that you come in contact with throughout the game. I also wish there was more of a balance between hidden object and problem solving. If it is categorized as a hidden object game, it should probably have more of it. All in all, I loved it and I will definitely be playing it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152985422', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 528, 'last_played': 1597578256}
review:
Il primo capitolo di una serie di tre giochi, che si basano sulla favole mitologiche slave. Anche in questo caso, Artifex Mundi presenta un prodotto ben fatto, con grafica piacevole, rilassante pur nel susseguirsi di eventi talvolta drammatici. Il gioco non presenta niente di diverso o particolare rispetto ad altri dello genere. Un " Oggetti Nascosti " che si lascia giocare. 
Lo consiglio solo in sconto, il prezzo pieno è esagerato.
Voto: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198396048245', 'num_games_owned': 452, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 712, 'last_played': 1547760756}
review: Es un juego muy bonito, muchos elementos llamativos y una buena historia, Artifex normalmente no suele prestar mucha atención a la historia, en este caso se han currado el argumento. Tanto los puzzles como los objetos están muy bien acabados, de por si es un juego muy colorido y resulta agradable jugar. Lo que veo es que es extremadamente fácil, y no es que yo sea una especialista en estos juegos, pero creo que debe tener una dificultad superior. Por lo demás genial, muy entretenido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027480683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 350, 'last_played': 1638590019}
review:
Not a bad game, just not a very good one.
Even on Expert the biggest obstacle is poor design, not good puzzle-solving.
The last level in particular has a problem with sending you backwards to previous locations to collect tools that were not previously available, and it doesn't have any indication that they have become so. You just need to brute-force search until you find that particular tool.

And though it's not very important to the gameplay, the character modeling is truly bizarre.

There are better puzzle games to play.

ETA: Also, there are no saves or checkpoints, yet there is missable content. So if you pass something by accident or click a hint or skip without meaning to, you will need to play through the ENTIRE game again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141634868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1546080837}
review: Ein sehr schönes Spiel. Die Rätsel sind nicht zu leicht, aber auch nicht zu schwer. Die Story ist stimmig und läd zum weiter spielen ein.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008512424', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1545959032}
review:
This game is so very charming. The art and music work really well together to make for a beautiful and relaxing experience, while the puzzling isn't difficult enough to be a constant hindrance even though some parts seem to lack some sort of guiding. (In some parts of the game you have to revisit a hidden object screen or two, to create objects that you now suddenly need even though there is nothing pointing this out to you.) Central to the puzzles is relying on knowledge of the objects that are depicted, e.g. that you'd want to apply tar to seal the repairs you made to a wooden rowboat, so different people will inevitably find the game easier than others might.

While I cannot judge whether the mythological parts are accurate to real world folk myths, the writing is honestly a delight. It's cheesy/hammy enough in the right places to be entertaining and engaging while also making me go along with both the voice acting that sometimes gets a bit rough, as well as all the silly point and click stuff the main character has to do.

author: {'steamid': '76561198317108451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1695154042}

author: {'steamid': '76561198197043521', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1543784533}
review:
Eventide, 9 Clues und ähnliche Puzzle Games kann ich für zwischendurch und für Puzzle-Games Liebhaber sehr empfehlen.
Man sollte nicht zu viele aufs Mal spielen, da sich diverse Rätsel oftmals wiederholen... Trotzdem sehr gelungen. DIe Stories in den Games sind auch immer wieder unterhaltsam. Die Spiele werden recht einfach gehalten, doch für die kleinen Preise, tolle Unterhaltung mit Rätseln :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198263249107', 'num_games_owned': 4496, 'num_reviews': 736, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1543257075}
review:
Игра на поиск предметов и головоломки. Всё в антураже славянской мифологии. Правда несколько странной версии, ну да ладно, в конце концов славянских народов огромная куча, может с кем-то и совпадает. Уже отрадно, что кто-то вылез из кокона мифологии западной Европы и  вспомнил, что Европа это не только готы да кельты, но и славяне.

Сюжет детский, графика милая, музыка приятная. Малость раздражает носиться туда-сюда с ил локации в локацию что бы применить где-то найденный за три девять земель предмет и открыть новую головоломку или получить другой предмет, который надо ещё бог знает куда отнести. Логика взаимодействия предметов тоже доставляет. Нет, мы, сидя в лесу не можем подобрать абы какую палку, что бы отковырнуть этот камень, нам надо сбегать километров за десять домой и подобрать для этого палку в саду. И эти листики мы не можем отодвинуть руками, что бы прочитать буквы под ними, нам надо бегать взад-вперёд по десятку локаций и пытаться собрать себе веник: прутики там, палочку сям, а для того что бы получить ленточку для связывания всего этого в веник, нам надо совершить подвиг - съесть дракона и выпить водяного.

Локализация не полная, только меню и субтитры, голоса и диалоги не локализованы. Да и в тексте местами встречаются огрехи.

Но в общем и целом, игра оставляет положительное впечатление.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001597029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1543771579}
review:
Я ожидал квест, а на самом деле это "найди то, чтобы открыть ящик, а в нём, ВНЕЗАПНО, лопата".
Всё очень однообразно и сводится к поиску скрытых предметов. Так и мотаешься от одного экрана к другому.
А ещё некоторые места поиска исполльзуются дважды. Видимо, лень было нвый экран нарисовать. Удовольствие сомнительное.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013130865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1542425916}
review:
Eventide: Slavic Fable has an amazing trove of imaginative artwork for its fabled creatures. This is the best feature of the game. There were several aggressively cute pieces of artwork (the bonus baby bear and Lilacus and his duck shirt take the prize imo) mixed with a whole lot of unique and well done ugly (ex. the Patton Oswalt thing at the Woodcarving show). There is a broad blend of tried and true puzzle options that those who play hidden object games frequently will find familiar, but will be a wonderful introduction to the genre for new players.

The story was ... different, and yet it too was familiar. The hero has a doctorate of some sort (in magical plant studies one must guess) but the setting is a theme park, which seems to be a real go-to general locale for these type of games. Just change the theme of the park, and poof, a whole new hidden object game. There were several typos throughout, and a few very strangely named objects (Morgenstern?) but this was manageable.

I recommend this game based upon the high cute factor combined with an overall solid casual game experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123160611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1516992891}

Dla słowian pozycja obowiązkowa :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197977197768', 'num_games_owned': 3607, 'num_reviews': 459, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1539883659}
review:
Eventide Slavic Fable fait partie des meilleurs hidden d' Artifex Mundi.

Si l'histoire en elle même a quelques lacunes et une durée de vie un peu courte même en mode expert, le fait de traiter des créatures mythiques slave nous change des éternels démons contemporain. De plus, une des collections du jeux consiste à récupérer des cartes qui présentent ces "créatures".

Bien détaillé, joliment coloré, la palette de teintes ajoute un cachet magique au jeu.

Le jeu en lui même est assez facile... que ce soit les SOC ou les puzzles... tout s'enchaine rapidement et rien ne vous bloquera.

author: {'steamid': '76561198830435914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1538241563}

author: {'steamid': '76561198141775948', 'num_games_owned': 1709, 'num_reviews': 323, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1537107045}
review:
他のシリーズに比べて物探しとミニゲームの数が少なめ。
行ったり来たりのアイテム使用が主になっている。
収集要素が何種類かあり、特に書類関係は判定がわかりづらい+取り逃しやすいので気になる人はガイドを参考に。
なお取り逃した部分は同じプロフィールであれば次の周回で未回収の部分を回収すればOK。
クリアまで3時間、エキストラ30分の短さだが変な翻訳とかは特になかったかのように思える。

author: {'steamid': '76561198033388937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 294, 'playtime_forever': 1843, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1843, 'last_played': 1536973033}
review:
Good adventure HOG.  Puzzles are reasonable for the casual gamer without being either pointlessly easy or frustratingly difficult.

The premise is interesting, the art is nice, and the music suits the game.

Overall, a solid game.  The bonus story was a little short, and the game itself wasn't quite as long or involved as it could have been, but otherwise there are no particular flaws.  There isn't a lot new here, but the setting was good and I enjoyed playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034193738', 'num_games_owned': 2536, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1536042293}
review:
[b]Eventide 1: Slavic Fable [/b](FROG/IHOG)

Options include separate sliders for Music and Sound, Custom Cursor, HD, and you can turn off Voice Overs if you wish.  There are three difficulties to choose from: Casual, Advanced and Expert.

The Graphics are very pretty, and the voice-overs are mostly good.  There was one character that talked so slowly that it drove me batty every time we had to interact with him.

There are two types of [b]Collectibles[/b] to watch for: 30 Flowers and 30 Character Cards. The cards are especially interesting, as they teach you about Slavic mythological creatures.  Cool!

The Hidden Object portion of the game seems to lean more towards Fragmented Objects, rather than find-by-list, and both types are lightly-interactive.

Story-wise, there's some pretty serious stuff going on, yet the overall feeling of the game is still relaxing and calm.

Despite Slavic Fable being released as a Standard Edition only, it includes [b]CE content[/b], including:
[list]
[*]Bonus Chapter
[*]20 re-watchable Cutscenes
[*]5 downloadable Music tracks
[*]6 Wallpapers (in three different resolutions)
[*]12 replayable HOS
[*]12 Concept Art
[*]25 Achievements
[/list]
The Bonus Chapter is pretty short, but gives us a little bit of backstory and a few new locations.

Eventide: Slavic Fable is nothing groundbreaking, as far as the genre goes, but it did make for a pleasant afternoon.  Recommended for IHOG and FROG fans!

author: {'steamid': '76561198808995311', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 6362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2383, 'last_played': 1707416866}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004578209', 'num_games_owned': 2928, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1534093480}
review: First I need to say that recorded does not reflect actual time in game.  I play a lot of times not online and I don't know if steam records that time so if it does then something is wrong with my PC or steam.  I enjoyed this game very much.  It is a somewhat more simple HOG but the story and sweet disposition makes up for that.  I only left two achievements unfinished: I did not get all collectible cards (I was a little too quick in some areas but you can go back and search as long as you do not finish the game.  There is a running tally so you have no excuse except for not paying attention-this is a HOG so of course you are paying attention?) The last achievement was playing on expert mode.  While I like this game very much I am not going back and replay on expert mode because I have too many games in my inventory that I need to play them first.  I don't always stick to this but I am with this game.  On the settings page there is a section where you can look at videos get wallpapers and look at artwork, etc.  Here you can look at all the HOG scenes.  Don't know if you can open any before the game is complete and I did not wan't to try and spoil all the fun of playing them in the game.  I did go back and replay the HOGs where only one scene was there any variety so they will get old kinda fast. The story?  You're a young lady who has to save grandma, and thats all I'm saying about that.  There is a bonus game where you have to save mama and thats all I'm saying about that.  Cuteness factor is high so if that does not appeal to you then don't play.  But play, I believe you will enjoy your time with this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142388245', 'num_games_owned': 448, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1533466442}
review:
Best point-and-click from Artifex Mundi I've played.

- Puzzles are interactive and require several steps to continue
- Doesn't feel like forced puzzles / stall for time
- Puzzle pieces are spread over various points in the story (not find all in a particular area)

author: {'steamid': '76561198218925323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1688050186}
review:
Eventide: Slavic Fable ist ein sehr gutes Wimmelbildspiel. Im Spiel wird eine schöne und logische Geschichte erzählt. Der Zeichenstil ist sehr hübsch und die einzelnen Szenen ansprechend arrangiert. Die Rätsel und Wimmelbilder fügen sich harmonisch ins Spielgeschehen ein und bestechen durch ihre Liebe zum Detail.
Die Rätsel und Wimmelbilder sind auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe Normal gut zu bewältigen (habe es auf Normal in ca. 5 Stunden durchgespielt)
Aus meiner Sicht absolut empfehlenswert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135194464', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1531107703}
review: Довольно качественная и приятная игра в жанре поиск предметов. Графика на уровне просто сказочная то же самое и с музыкой полное погружение в эту историю - сказку. Головоломки не сложные и даже на эксперте не вызывают затруднений. Рекомендую. Ознакомлюсь с 2 - й и 3 - й частью, уж очень понравилась.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027686399', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1687767799}
review:
I have to admit, I'm a bit disappointed. I've heard of the Eventide series as being very popular, and while I enjoyed this one and am glad I played it, it wasn't as fun as I was hoping. It was pretty standard as far as Artifex Mundi HOGs go.

Still, disappointed or not, I bought it on sale and I don't regret it. It was an enjoyable few hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312142079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1530963556}
review:
Не лучшая игра издателя. Сюжет и атмосфера не интересные, славянские сказки и мифы тут не чувствуются. Анимация неприятная. Игровой процесс искусственно удлинён: найденные предмет применяется в локации через четыре назад/вперёд от места нахождения. Много слишком явных заимствований из других игорь издателя: например, скопированная загадка с подвестным мостом. Я не говорю о типичных для издателя задачах, я говорю о грубом самокопировании. Интересных загадок нет: типичные загадки издателя поданы не интересно, уникальных загадок мало и они кривоваты.
Не рекомендую. Это не проходная игра, а явно неудачная игра.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971712885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1697280536}
review:
Линия основной истории без неожиданностей, без изюминки, но и без откровенной "дурки". Здесь не приходится искать винт от вертолета, чтобы заменить деталь на прикроватном вентиляторе. Не удивляешься даже необычным героям, с которыми встречаешься. Ведь готов был к попаданию в сказку, запуская игру, исходя из названия и обложки игры. Размеренное повествование с понятными задачами. Картинки красочные, музыка спокойная, торопиться не нужно - как раз для тихого вечера у камина. Если у вас нет камина, то некоторые квесты вы, увы, не пройдете... Шутка, конечно!
Дополнительная история, по сути - это приквел к основной, и сделана она слабее, на мой взгляд. Примитивнее по содержанию, но все же своеобразно формирует целостность всего повествования. Много времени не отнимает, поэтому на мою субъективную оценку всей игры никак не повлияла. А оценка - хорошо. Но рекомендуется сугубо для любителей слайдшоу-квестов.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971202050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1530351266}

author: {'steamid': '76561198435157201', 'num_games_owned': 4819, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1530321783}
review: 保持着Artifex一贯的脏兮兮的画风。虽然如此，这一作在解谜上迷之用心。不像有些作品拿一堆支离破碎的小游戏充数，这一作的小游戏和隐藏物品谜题都相对不多（但也不算少），特别有特色的是剧情在连贯性方面做得特别出色，许多线索需要倒回好几个场景前才能发现，这是不少同类作品锁不能做到的，可见这一部的确是一部佳作。而且剧情也不脑残，反派也不算小聋瞎，我真的局得海星。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035519735', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1515385471}
review:
Firstly, I'd lke to state this isn't a [i]bad[/i] game. However I really can't recommend it. Unless perhaps you haven't played many Hidden Object - Point and Click (HOPAC) games before. I've played a lot of HOPAC games by Artifex Mundi and this is the first one that had very positive reviews that I really didn't like. I wish there had been more negative reviews that had pointed out some of the flaws because there are better HOPAC games out there for the same price or less.

 In one word this game is; [b]Disappointing[/b].

Even if this is your first HOPAC I would recommend you buy [b]Grim Tales Forsaken Bride[/b] instead. Much of the game play - especially the mini games - are identical to those in Forsaken Bride, but Forsaken Bride does everything so much better.

As mentioned in some of the other negative reviews there is very little that is 'slavic' about this game apart from the overuse of the label 'slavic'. The story is increadibly sparse compared to other Artifex Mundi games and has very little to do with the puzzles you have to solve to progress. The result was you end up feeling like youre pressing a next button for no reason and it becomes boring very quickly.

If finding pitchforks in stainglass window sills and going back and forth a lot between scenes to solve puzzles sounds like fun then you will probably enjoy this game.
If you are looking for a narrative driven puzzle game where there is some logic to where you find items and what you then use them on this game may not be for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119412142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1528199740}
review:
crappy. I enjoy hidden objects but this one just irritates me.

con - the window around an area of interest is so big you often click it again mistaking it for something else to look at
 - the acting is over to top. The kid is too cutesy and the villian too outrageous.
- the story is average but not really engaging.

pro - ummm cannot think of one. I guess it does it job but would put this in the average category.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982940540', 'num_games_owned': 1150, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1526158616}
review: My first game of this type (hidden object). I like graphics (and animation with it) but story is pretty poor. Main story campaing took me aprox 3 hours (on middle difficulty) and bonus campaing took aprox one hour. I guess thats acceptible for this type of game. If the game was longer I would probably got bored before I could finish it. I got it for few cents from bundle so I will rate positively. But I wouldnt personally pay more than 2$ for it. Although Im not a fan of this genre.

review:
Bon jeu et bonne histoire. Le monde et les personnages fantastiques ne sont pas trop présents et donc ne dénature pas le scénario. Les graphismes sont agréables et les personnages attachants. En revanche, on pourrait déplorer le peu de difficulté même en expert et les objets bonus qui sont trop simples à trouver.
Une petite et courte histoire bonus qui a le mérite d'exister et qui est à l'image de l'histoire principale.
Un bon Artifex Mundi comme on les aime

author: {'steamid': '76561197997518664', 'num_games_owned': 2644, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 935, 'last_played': 1520102069}
review:
Это моя первая игра в подобном жанре. Играл с дочерью трёх лет. Ей хотелось тоже играть за компьютером, как папа, поэтому понадобилась игра с подходящим для ребёнка наполнением, достаточно простым управлением и неторопливым геймплеем. Ребёнок остался в восторге, персонажи яркие и запоминающиеся. Мне же показалось, что анимация откровенно слаба. Какая-то она "флэшовая", что ли: объекты - статичные картинки, двигающиеся по фону или просто сменяющие друг друга; персонажи, как куклы, состоят из фрагментов тела, шевелятся соответствующе; анимация лиц при диалогах особенно не удалась - контур статичен, рот по нему гуляет, глаза съезжают, очень заметно и халтурно. Задники красивые, головоломки несложные и разнообразные, действия в целом логичные.

В целом я доволен, ребёнок научился пользоваться мышкой. Будем осваивать жанр дальше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004233477', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1525318459}
review:
The Eventide series of hidden object puzzle adventures is one of the crown jewels in the Artifex Mundi family. I think part of its strength is the fact the game focuses on a heroine in a unique setting with a unique profession. In the case of the Eventide series, the games follow a botanist who explores various fantastical environs in the modern day.

Eventide 1 introduces us to our heroine. She's visiting her grandmother's "heritage park", like a historical reenactment village, and learns that various Slavic myths are real. She uses her botany skills and the help of some fantasy creatures to solve the issue at hand.

The art in this game, as in the sequels, is gorgeous, as is the music. 

What I really appreciate is that, although the game is somewhat easy, the game is very well crafted. Most puzzles and thematic elements directly have to do with botany or fantasy stuff. There isn't a ton of filler. It's highly immersive, and that, above all else, is what I care about in a hidden object puzzle game.

Details for HOPA fans:

- There are collectibles in the game, a few different kinds

- If you liked Nightmares from the Deep or the Enigmatis series, you'll really like this game/series

- Although the game may, on the surface, seem similar to Enigmatis: Ravenwood, the games are very different. The only things they have in common are that they're high quality games that have a similar color palette and feature heroines who use their professional skills to solve a problem in an amusement park type of setting (at least for Eventide 1 and Enigmatis 2 specifically, not other games in those series). The differences are tone, professions of the heroines and how those relate to the game (and both play major roles in the game), and genre (I'd say Ravenwood leans way more into horror and Eventide leans way more into mythological fantasy).

author: {'steamid': '76561197980246104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 301, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2, 'last_played': 1545702030}

author: {'steamid': '76561198118272933', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1518116479}
review:
[h1]Игра, как сказка.[/h1]

Замечательная игра-поиск. Проходится легко и уверенно. При прохождении игра вызывала только положительные эмоции. Помимо множества головоломок нам предлагают так же собирать предметы коллекционирования (цветочки и карточки) и читать разбросанные по локациям книги, бумажки и таблички.

Головоломки не утомляют и решаются спокойно, нет ничего такого, чтобы мозг плавился от непонимания "Что делать?".  Игра проста: подумали - навели - щелкнули... Локации красочны, проработаны. Музыка хороша и разнообразна. Особенно понравились звуки во время поиска.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1294436909
Атмосфера в игре умиротворяющая, вокруг лес, свежий воздух, болото с лечебной грязью.

[h1]Мифические существа рядом с нами.[/h1]

Цель игры как всегда помощь. На этот раз нас "призвали", чтобы применить свои навыки садовода-ботаника для спасения цветка, вызволения похищенной бабушки, ну и конечно же искоренения зла.

"Славянская мифология" представлена здесь в виде: 
[b]Баба[/b] (не Яга) - смотрительница волшебного места и по совместительству наша бабушка. 
[b]Леший[/b] - мудрый страж, такой дядько с седой бородой, поросшей мхом, и руками-деревяшками. 
[b]Банный[/b] - это нечто полуголое и закутанное в нижней части полотенцем, желающее попариться в ванне. Не думала, что его можно представить в таком виде. 
[b]Мистические существа[/b] - забавные зверюшки. Чтобы быть в человеческом образе нужна пыльца из цветка папоротника.
[b]Водяной[/b] - такое милое синее подводное и дружелюбное существо с большим пузенькой.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1293603912
[b]Борута[/b] - главный герой-злодей, который долго ждал нас и до нашего появления не рашался похитить бабушку. Когда писала обзор задумалась кто это? потому что не слыхала в русских сказках. Получается Борута - польский лесной дух, демон, охраняющий сокровища Ленчицкого замка в Польше.
Еще есть [b]Моль[/b], но она к славянской мифологии никакго отношения не имеет, но звучит красиво. Вы представляете серую бабочку, а к вам летит нечто похожее на горгулью.

Я конечно думаю, что игра немного далека от этой самой мифологии, просто надо было за что-то зацепиться разработчикам и дать нам знакомое, доброе и вызывающее ассоциацию с детством.А с другой стороны это ведь сказочные существа и место магическое, почему бы не представить все так, как нам и показали в этой игре.)

После того как игра пройдена откроется дополнительная история "Ночь на Ивана Купала", где главной героиней будет девочка (мне показалось, что это Баба в детстве и места знакомые).
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1295121761
Сравнивая эту игру с другими подобными пройденными мной, хочу сказать, что она отличается от них. Очень понравился разнообразный поиск предметов, уникальные и такие родные-знакомые персонажи, да и сама атмосфера игры приятна.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008914127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1527527233}
review:
This game isn't awful, it just isn't so good that I'd recommend it.  Artiflex Mundi are definitely one of my favourite developers when it comes to games, but this one feels a bit lazy as if they just wanted more of the same.

The story is pretty standard - you need to save a park and your grandmother. You meet characters along the way, solve puzzles and some hidden object scenes. They are generally logical and take a little bit of thought but aren't too taxing. 

The opportunity for it to be based on slavic mythology could have been really interesting bu they don't make much of this at all. Some of the rendering of some of the characters is also sloppy, bordering on nightmarish - bucktoothed-squirrel-boy with his hands firmly on his pants anyone?

The game also feels very short indeed. If I were you I'd stick to Enigmatis by the same publisher. Much better (certainly 1 and 2 - haven't played 3 yet) and more rewarding games all round.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259764178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 476, 'last_played': 1516798923}
review:
That was definitely beyond what I was expecting. The story and slavic mythical creatures setting was interesting and there was a good mixture of difficulty and variety with the puzzles. It wasn't all just point and click, and it wasn't all super easy nor was it too hard, right in the goldilocks range in my opinion.

The bonus stage really brought the story and characters around for me. They were nice, but by the bonus stage, I liked them more.

If you're a fan of puzzle and hidden object games, and enjoy a dash of mythology, this game will be right up your alley.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996624005', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 705, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1516488978}
review:
This game combines a narrative about slavic mythological creatures with hidden objects and logic puzzles. You are a  heroine in a slavic fairytale theme park who must travel through different settings, combine objects to create tools and interact with characters. One of my favorite parts of this game is the beautiful artwork.  The storyline and cut scenes for this game are fun and moderately compelling.I also find this style game very relaxing since there is no time limit to accomplish tasks/games.I also reccomend this game for ages 10 and up since the modes allow you to vary the difficulty. Depending on the mode you choose, you can look for where on the map you need to take action, you can press the hint button (reloads at different speeds) and you can skip any of the puzzle games. I believe most people would finish this game in 10-12 hours. One thing to keep in mind for this style game is that the objects you must find can be in really odd arbitrary places and a lot of objects you find are broken, so you have to fix them before use. You will have to go back and forth between settings in order to open trunks/objects and create tools. This particular game isn't as outrageous in the location of objects but it is something you have to accept in order to enjoy these hidden object games. There are dozens of these style games, so if you like it there are a wide variety of stories with the same game mechanics.

TLDR
Slavic Mythological creature narrative with hidden picture and logic puzzles.

PROS
-Beautiful Artwork
-Varying difficulties (modes) 
-Simple game mechanics
-No time limits for puzzles
-All players can beat/ complete the story
-Enjoyable for a variety of ages
-Narrative moderately compelling/creative
-Bonus game with collectors edition fun

CONS
-Short game (10-12 hours of play)
-Low replay value
-Must sustain disbelief when finding objects in odd locations

author: {'steamid': '76561198036732294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1515338168}
review:
3時間でストーリークリアしました。これからエクストラにチャレンジします。
無難にまとまっているので、普通にポインティングゲームが好きな人にお勧めします。

ただ、お勧めはしますが、ごく個人的な感想だと「好きじゃない」になります・・。好みの問題ですが・・。

自分は、ポインティングゲームは絵を見るのが好きなのですが、このゲームは美術が生理的に合いませんでした。
生物の絵が全般的に合わない感じで、特にメインキャラの子供とおばあちゃんの外見については、説明は難しいですが、なんとも言えない気持ち悪さを感じました。
気持ち悪いという印象を引きずってゲームしていると、ほかにも人工的なオブジェクトや色使いも「濃すぎる」のが鼻につくといいますか・・どうも個人的に相性が悪かったようです。

海外のカラフルなお菓子を見たとき、「かわいい」と思う人と、「気持ち悪い」と思う人の違いみたいなもんだと思います。

ハーブとか森に棲む生物とか、モチーフはとても好きなので、続編もやってみようとは思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561197983794856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1515100736}
review:
After buying, and playing a few minutes of the game Hope Lake, I started getting absurd amounts of these similar object-hunting puzzle games from Artifex Mundi recommended to me on Steam. Because of the Steam Christmas Sale, I figured I'd give of them a try to see if they were my cup of tea. I went with this one because I was curious how it'd go into Slavic myths. Unfortunately, it does so very superficially, just using a few names of monsters and spirits.

I will say the game is quite pretty, with lovely painted and photoshopped graphics mostly in a motion comic style. The music isn't bad either.

Gameplay isn't great though, and I suspect all these games are largely the same. It's like playing an adventure game where every item you try to pick up first has to be repaired or reassembled, and almost nothing you find is relevant to the direct area, which pads out the game as you constantly have to go back and forth through locations. The game has a hint system that directs you to the next possible action (slowly recharging depending on which difficulty setting you chose), but I mostly found myself using it to direct me to whichever one of the fifteen simultaneously unsolved puzzle locations I needed to use the little wooden reindeer or seashell or owl medallions for, because I sure couldn't remember anymore.

Periodicially, you face screens that are completely cluttered with random items, and you'll have to click on a bunch of items either by a list of words or a series of pictures at the bottom of the screen. The game protects itself from you just madly clicking all over the place by punishing such behavior with a misty haze falling over the screen and the character remarking that they must calm down. What I found annoying at least in this game, is that many times the items you must find are a bunch of indistinct bits of piping, horn or wood that make them really hard to distinguish from the background, especially since they're often mostly obscured by other junk. I get that's sort of the point, but at least make them recognizable items so I can actually look for them.

That said, the game is very, very easy, so much that I think it's meant more for young players. It does require a bit of patience and concentration though, unless you just want to breeze through with the hint system. If you enjoy this kind of gameplay you're in luck, as it seems there's dozens of them available on Steam, but I didn't get much enjoyment out of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107875152', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 724, 'last_played': 1513644537}
review:
Wir hatten sehr viel Spaß mit diesem schönen Spiel.
Ob es um die herliche Grafik ging
oder um die faszinierende Geschichte.
Die Rätsel waren in beidem sehr gut eingebettet.
Der Spielefluss sowie das Preis/Leistungsverhältnis,
als auch die Musik sind ebenfalls --Top.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043495274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 339, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1513419212}
review:
Durée de vie trame principale : 2,5 h
Durée de vie aventure bonus : 30 min

Trame scénaristique * Petite fille d'une herboriste gardienne de parc, cette dernière vous appelle pour lui venir en aide et sauver la faune et la flore magique de ces lieux. 
Ambiance * Joli, coloré, mignonet

SOC * peu nombreuses
Puzzles * difficulté facile

Succès steam OK
Pas de bug / Pas de coquille

Très mignon mais assez vite conclu, cet opus a son charme mais entre, pour moi, dans la catégorie des Artifex Mundi justes "esthétiques" manquant un petit peu de challenge. Après quoi, je le recommande tout de même !

author: {'steamid': '76561198178166657', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1547293463}
review:
Довольно трудно писать обзор на эту игру, потому что неоднозначное мнение сложилось во время прохождения. 
На самом деле, у [i]Artifex Mundi[/i] очень редко выходят плохие игры, которые катигорически не нравятся никому [spoiler]( мне в такие играть не приходилось)[/spoiler], но тут настолько "чумовой" сюжет, что иногда, во время игры, становиться даже смешно...

[b]Посудите сами[/b]: бабушка (которую почему-то все называют БАБА) зовёт свою внучку для того, чтобы спасти цветок магического папоротника, но внезапно злой сосед крадёт бабушку, чтобы убить её и превращаться в угодных ему существ(?!). Возможно, я просто не понял чего-то, но игра действительно получилась буквально сказочная. Всё, что не делается сводится к магии и магическим существам (Банный убил просто). 
Но все остальные параметры хороши и радуют глаз. Саундтрек тоже неплохой, дополнительная история не такая хорошая, но и в ней есть интересные моменты, игровое время не затянуто, вобщем, всё как надо. 

[b]ИТОГ:[/b]
Игра получилась в меру хорошей. В ней меня порадовало всё, кроме сюжета. Однозначно не рекомендую начинать знакомство с квестами именно с этой игры, но на вечерок опытных игроков с хорошей закалкой она может затянуть.
Спасибо за внимание.

review: Allein dass das Spiel so schöne Märchencharakteren und wunderschöne traumhafte Orte bietet,macht es für mich zu einem liebgewonnenen Zeitvertreib.Ich finde es toll,das es so mystisch ist, so versetzt es mich in meine Kindheit zurück .Es bringt Spass die Geheimnisse und Aufgaben zu lösen, ich kann nichts negatives sagen. weiter so !!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198035835415', 'num_games_owned': 713, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1507636313}
review:
Ein schönes Spiel mit einer märchenhaften Atmosphäre. Wer es lieber ruhiger mag und keine anspruchsvollen Rätsel erwartet, für Denjenigen ist dieses Spiel genau das Richtige. Die Wimmelbilder sind wunderschön und die Story kurz und knackig. Ab und an hatte ich Probleme, bestimmte Gegenstände zu finden, weil sie sehr gut versteckt sind, jedoch ist das gar nicht so schlimm. Die Minispiele sind dagegen sehr leicht. Nebenbei kannst du dich durch die malerische Gegend durchklicken und Karten oder Blumen sammeln.

Kann die negative Bewertung teilweise gar nicht nachvollziehen. Nicht jedes Wimmelbild muss einen herausfordern.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349763234', 'num_games_owned': 1019, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1512677746}
review:
+美术华丽，细节丰富
+作为一款解谜游戏，它的配音很棒
+有成熟的官方中文化

-代入感不足
-设置的谜题过于冗杂

点评：
解谜游戏吸引人的前提是玩家愿意主动去探究，而不是你设置好一大堆冗杂的套路告诉玩家：来，把它们解开
玩家会很疑惑：我为什么要来解开这该死的谜语？
从精美华丽的美术、细节音效、以及完善的配音可以看到制作者的用心
可惜游戏一开始就没能抓住玩家的游玩欲望。

评分：★★★☆☆

author: {'steamid': '76561198015324296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 430, 'last_played': 1507228532}
review:
Definitely a good and casual HOS game. Fairy and magic atmosphere and characters, well rendered by a vast majority of beautiful graphics. 
Puzzles (mini games) and HO scenes intertwine well along a good enough story. Mini games are fairly easy. The game in itself is quite easy too, but enjoyable. The pace of the game is ok for casual gamers.  
Achievements are not difficult to get. Sadly, the game is a bit short. For that reason I'd only get it on sale. 
A nice game, that Artifex fans could appreciate.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078882224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1503956892}
review:
I have never thought that I will hate this game as much as I do. I played a few Artifex Mundi games and while they were never that great they were still enjoyable. This one is not only much too easy to the point that it is almost insulting to the player, it has also little to no sense. It looks like I could finish the game while I was just using the random items. 

But the worst are all the Slavic references. First of all, we are constantly reminded that it is about Slavic. "There is a piece of paper let's write down "Slavic" for no reason."

The sadest thing is that even though the Artifex Mundi is a Polish company (so they are Slavic) it looks like they did no reseach at all. I am no expert about slavic tales but I am pretty sure that I would hear something about a talking squirrel that is very important in that game for some unknown reason. 

In conlusion, I do not recomend this game for anyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031202804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1630490798}

author: {'steamid': '76561198403486741', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1503051206}
review:
Przyjemna oprawa audiowizualna, proste i relaksujące zagadki, słowiańskie klimaty. 

Jedyny problem jest taki, że wiele gier tego wydawcy wykorzystuje dokładnie te same schematy ( szkło do przecięcia?-znajdź diament- zrobione!). Jeśli zagrało się w jedną, czasem ma się wrażenie, że grało się już we wszystkie. 
Nie jest to może jakaś poważna wada, ale pomiędzy podejściami do różnych produkcji tego studia zalecam trochę przerwy.

Gra sama w sobie idealna na długie jesienne wieczory (no, może na jeden wieczór ;) )

author: {'steamid': '76561198407724391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1501290396}
review:

Las animaciones están horribles, es lo que menos me gustó del juego, a todas les daba skip.

review: Играл, чтобы посмотреть, как в игре адаптировали славянскую мифологию. На мой взгляд, получилось вполне достойно, учитывая особенности целевой аудитории. В [i]hidden object[/i] играл первый раз, так что адекватно оценить не могу, хотя мне понравилось.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060863711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1501102556}
review:
I always thought point and click games weren't any fun. Played one many, many years ago and since then have always avoided them. But, now that I can't play most games due to a cast for boxer's fracture, I decided to buy this, since it was very cheap on sale anyway. Count me surprised! This turned out to be a really cool adventure. It has beautifull graphics with animations and video's, nice puzzle solving etc.. It's a high quality work and really fun to play too. It has actually gotten me into a genre I always thought was boring hehe. Immediately bought another one from Artifex Mundi aswell.

Definitely recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198299346669', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1500637253}
review:
唔..因为自己手残..玩了很多我力不能及的游戏导致心态炸了，所以决定买几个解谜游戏玩玩..
因为很久以前看逆风大天使直播玩了乌鸦森林系列，觉得蛮有意思
于是就找了比较相近的这款游戏

首先剧情是一般解谜游戏的套路，不算很长，我第一次亲自玩解谜游戏，3.5小时通全关包括附加剧情[b]中间还吃了顿饭[/b]
画面很好看BGM也很棒 听着BGM玩会手机也挺惬意的

人物刻画方面...‘’都还蛮有特点的‘’ 
森林里有个老头要洗澡那个，记不清叫什么名字了，其实不吓人，但这人无论是在附加剧情还是主线剧情里，几乎都是突然一张大黑脸出来，还长得丑，所以有时心里会咯噔一下

游戏难度很适合像我这样的新手，有一些卡关，我主要卡在了连水管[spoiler] 呵呵这么简单我也卡[/spoiler]、寻物解谜找打火机[spoiler] 那玩意真的太小了[/spoiler]还有一些想不到的物品用法

总之游戏还不错，可玩性很高，趁打折时低价买玩一玩还是挺值的

author: {'steamid': '76561197971047607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1500519537}
review:
A well presented Hidden Object game with beautiful artwork and graphics, strong voice acting, a bonus chapter, decent length, interesting HO scenes and a Slavic fairy tale setting that is fresh.

The only negatives I have are that occasionally the object needed to advance and where it interacted with was unclear or didn't make sense, and the story is the typical "rescue a loved one while there are supernatural forces at play" plot the HO games rarely stray from.

Overall, it held my interest to the end, and the presentation is excellent. HO fans won't be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127831772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1500484411}
review: Nice and easy puzzle game, quite good if you're just looking for a casual game

author: {'steamid': '76561197986416959', 'num_games_owned': 369, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1500510577}
review: A very calming and relaxing game, the world was very soothing. The puzzles weren't overly difficult and you also had the option to use hints and even skips if puzzles became too frustrating (at least on the lower difficulties) which I personally liked, I play these types of games as stress relievers and sometimes they can get overly fiddly but that wasn't the case here. The audio helped set the tone, with the music being very calming throughout, although I did experience some audio popping here and there which was a shame. The voice acting and story were serviceable, don't expect too much but what's there is cute and adds something to the game so you're not just randomly solving puzzles for no reason. Overall it's a good point and click game that I'm happy to recommend to fans of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185995181', 'num_games_owned': 1349, 'num_reviews': 900, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1500385380}
review:
挺不错的游戏。
游戏画面略显艳丽，不过看起来还行。就是人物有点丑。。
BGM挺不错的，不过人物配音还是老样子。
故事流程还是非常简单易懂的了，游戏流程也不长。
至于谜题嘛。。。简直就是酸酸的，甜甜的。一点难度都没有。推荐直接专家模式通关得了。
另外，我怎么感觉这游戏里的斯拉夫神话一股凯尔特神话的味道。尤其是手镯上那个德鲁伊教得标志。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198050031207', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 360, 'last_played': 1500376109}
review:
Nun ja... grundsätzlich schlecht ist das Spiel nicht. 

Pro:
Liebevolle Gestaltung
Synchronisiert
Abwechslungsreiche Minispiele
Einfache Archivements

Contra:
Absolutes NOGO... Werbung in einem gekauftem Spiel 
Normal und Experten Modus sind vom Ablauf genau gleich. Man erwartet erschwerte Minigames o. Puzzles
Mir persönlich waren die Rätsel  zu einfach
Story ohne viel Tiefgang
Somit kaum Spielzeit

Im Sale habe ich ca. 3 Euro bezahlt, mehr wäre m.E. auch nicht angemessen für dieses Spiel

author: {'steamid': '76561198080370930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1499776851}
review:
Typical HOG, well made, flowing game play, lovely artwork, non intrusive soundtrack, and easy to follow story. Worht paying full price, but always better if you can pick it up in the sale.
Basically what you'd expect from Artifex Mundi, some other developers/publishers need to be taking notes.

It has everything you need;

Map
Fast travel
trading cards
Acheivements
Working hint button
A good walkthrough available on line (though you really shouldn't need it).

If I have one minor grumble, it's that some of the puzzles were a little too easy.

Rating                      90/100
Replay value           2/10 (only to pick up a missed acheivement)
Play time approx     4-5 hours

author: {'steamid': '76561197986784312', 'num_games_owned': 228, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1558849130}

author: {'steamid': '76561197972822414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 412, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1498940390}
review: A decent enough hidden object game. After playing so many of these I don't know what else to say really. The story is entertaining, the art work is good and the puzzles are simple casual fun. Just what you are looking for in this type of game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1498529007}
review:
https://youtu.be/UxC_rURI1Is

There are crimes and mysteries only a botanist can solve and Eve Ntide is the right woman for the job.  Tracking down a critic message from her estranged grandmother, Eve finds her self in a world outside her wildest imaginations.

Being a casual hidden object game does limit the range of challenge that it can provide to players, Eventide walks the line well enough by presenting puzzles that may be easy but don't feel insultingly so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124842083', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1497395035}
review:
Grze można wiele zarzucić. Jest niedopracowana, nieco amatorska, ma infantylną fabułę. Ale ostatecznie mogę ją polecić jako niewymagający sposób na odprężenie po ciężkim dniu.

Pierwsze, co rzuciło mi się w oczy, to pozostawiająca wiele do życzenia oprawa graficzna. O ile lokacje są przyzwoite, o tyle projekty postaci - amatorskie, a ich animacja - groteskowa. Nie wiedziałam, czy się śmiać, czy płakać, gdy po raz pierwszy zobaczyłam, jak sylwetka i twarz bohatera, zamiast dorysowanych ręcznie kolejnych klatek, wydłuża się i wygina, symulując ruch i mimikę.

Fabuła jest naiwna. Oczywiście, prostota historii w tego typu grach jest zrozumiała, ale ta jest wręcz naiwna. Staram się jednak przymykać na to oko, bo wydaje mi się, że gra jest kierowana raczej do dzieci. Ale tu pojawia się mój kolejny zarzut - brak aspektu edukacyjnego. Nie oczekiwałabym go, gdyby nie to, że gra, począwszy od swojego tytułu po fakt, że rozgrywa się w skansenie/muzeum mitologii słowiańskiej, aż krzyczy, jak bardzo jest słowiańska. I byłam przekonana, że rzeczywiście dowiem się z niej czegoś na temat słowiańskich wierzeń. Niestety, chociaż znalazły się tu tradycyjne chaty, uroki, runy i kwiat paproci, temat został potraktowany pobieżnie i osoba, która nie jest z nim obeznana, wiele się nie nauczy.

Jednak gdyby wszystkie powyższe zarzuty potraktować z przymrużeniem oka i skupić się na rozgrywce, gra się broni. Ledwo, ale jednak się broni. Przejście całości zajęło mi około czterech godzin i nie był to czas do końca stracony. Gry hidden object, w jakie zdarzało mi się dotychczas grać, gameplayowo ograniczały się wyłącznie do wypełnionych szczegółami plansz z przedmiotami do znalezienia, jednak w Eventide wypatrywanie przedmiotów na obrazkach było tylko jednym z elementów, tak jak łamigłówki logiczne, a całość zaklasyfikowałabym raczej jako point-and-click. Główne zadanie gracza opisałabym jako chodzenie od lokacji do lokacji w poszukiwaniu miejsc, w których wymagany jest jakiś przedmiot lub element układanki, a następnie stopniowe znajdowanie tych przedmiotów i otwieranie dostępu do kolejnych miejsc. Jest to przyjemny proces, chociaż ma też swoją wadę - czasem potrzebne przedmioty oraz miejsca, w których należało ich użyć, były tak od siebie oddalone, że zdążyłam już zapomnieć, do czego właściwie dany przedmiot był mi potrzebny i gdzie powinnam go użyć. Gra cierpi też oczywiście na typowe problemy point-and-clicków - dlaczego bohaterka nie może po prostu odgarnąć pajęczyny ręką, zamiast konstruować miotełkę, itp.

Mając zero-jedynkowy wybór polecenia gry lub jej odradzenia, decyduję się na polecenie. Jeśli nie macie dużych oczekiwań (a ja, przyznam, miałam zerowe oczekiwania, dostając do rąk plik darmowych kodów na prawie wszystkie gry stworzone/wydane przez Artifex Mundi) i jesteście w stanie śmiać się z niedociągnięć, będziecie w stanie docenić tę przyjemną, choć bardzo przeciętną produkcję.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052497697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1591, 'last_played': 1517189598}

author: {'steamid': '76561198391348280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1496667994}
review:
游戏流程不长，大概3个小时就能通关。画面要比artifex其他作品精美，而且文字寻物只有三四处，大部分都是照着图形找东西，没有机翻错误所以流畅了很多。
隐藏物品是30朵颜色超级显眼的花和30张寓言卡片，我卡片少了一张，二周目的话以前找到的卡片也可以计入成就，但少的那张位置还空着。
决定二周目。
