author: {'steamid': '76561198074298261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1492887943}
review:
It's not often you encounter a game so bad it truly makes you angry, but this one does, and the fact that this shameful piece of rubbish came from Artifex Mundi just makes it worse. This game assumes you are a particularly untalented (possibly lobotomized) chimpanzee with learning difficulties, and even if you are, you will still be flying through the game with zero resistance. I am not exaggerating when I say this: [b]Every puzzle could easily be replaced with a big [i]”NEXT”[/i] button, without affecting game difficulty in any relevant manner.[/b] Yes, it's literally that easy.  
 
This game is an insult to human intellect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274468298', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 988, 'last_played': 1686556816}
review: I loved this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126899980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1494490356}
review:
チベたん クエストのあまりの狂いっぷりに、「今度はスラブだ！」と期待して買ったんだけれども、予想外に普通で・・・まあ、チベたんとは開発元が違うんだけれども。

毒にも薬にもならなさそうな、オーソドックスなストーリー。

囚われのヒロインがおばあちゃん。純粋な心を持つという誰得な設定。悪役は「仕事がつまらないから、無敵になって世界征服する！」という中二病を発症したおっさん。仕事辞めたらいいやない？ 別に世界征服しなくていいやん？ 
主人公はお姉さんだー！でも顔が出てくるのはここの販売画面のバナーのみ。逆にしてくれ、主人公ばあさんでいいからさ。

・・・と、ここまでは いつものArtifex Mundiなんだけど、大仏の目が光ったり、猫耳のおっさんがいたり、やたら犬のアニメーションに力が入っていたり、ヘビが好きでしょうがなかったり...というおかしな拘りもなく、ごくごく普通に進んでしまう。Artifex Mundiが普通とか、おかしいだろ！

他に狂っているのは、人間のデッサンくらい。おばあちゃんが鎖で縛られているシーンなんかは手が変なところから生えている。

日本語訳は完璧ではないにしろ、とくに問題がない範囲。パズルはどこに使うアイテムかは分かり難いものの、難易度は並。

普通を求めている人はどうぞ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198110538083', 'num_games_owned': 490, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1494284807}
review: I really enjoyed the story of Eventide, everything linked in and made complete sense by the end so I can really recommend you hold out until that final scene because it clears up a lot! Loved the voice acting, and even though the facial animations could have done with some work I can't wait to play the second game! 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083289730', 'num_games_owned': 1424, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1494153358}
review: Decent point and click with a nice story line (ah well it is entertaining anyway), nice graphics and a lot of traveling. The navigate map function is a bit rough (it puts you somewhere near where you are suppose to be but it might be a few screen ahead or back as well). Recommended for an hour of more of fun, the story is not too long but long enough...

author: {'steamid': '76561198010646714', 'num_games_owned': 436, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1494168991}
review:
Wszystkie gry tego studia są unikalne oraz zadbane i ciekawe w swej prostocie. Uwielbiam grać w gry wydane przez Artifex Mundi oraz mam nadzieję że będą dalej się rozwijać i kreować coraz to nowsze i lepsze gry nie zapominając jak zaczynali :D
Mam również nadzieję że gry z Pyrkonu 2017r będą kiedyś dostępne na steamie. Jak dla mnie gry tego studia zasługują na pochwałę i docenienie nie tylko moje ale także i wasze polecam zagrać w choćby jeden tytuł a przekonacie się że warto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972999224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 284, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1493494385}
review: This was a good one. How often do you see stories about slavic mythos let alone in a HOG. My one problem is some of the puzzles or items are not as intuitive as they could be. Like Magnet that you need to extend the range of and a rope. Use the rope on the magnet? Nope. Use the rope on a door in the same room to open the latch. (You'll see, it makes sense.) The actual item to go with the magnet is a string on a stick. Other then that this was a nice change of atmosphere. Kind of reminded me a little of Enigmatis 2 with the abandoned theme park.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198255002887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1489421936}
review:
[h1]Eventide : Slavic Fable[/h1]

Jeu d’aventure, objets cachés inspiré de la mythologie slave, « Eventide : Slavic Fable » qui m’a été gracieusement offert ! C’est mon premier Artifex Mundi donc je n’ai pas de point de comparaison mais mon avis est assez partagé. 
Certes le côté visuel, sonore, les nombreuses créatures rencontrées ainsi que les nombreux jeux et énigmes ont tout pour séduire mais l’histoire de fond m’a laissé sur ma faim. Elle est très courte, sans rebondissement et laisse peu de chance de s’attacher aux personnages. C’est la première fois que l’envie de résoudre d’autres énigmes et mini-jeux me motivent d’avantage que l’envie de connaître la suite de l’histoire. Néanmoins les énigmes bien que faciles, sont plutôt bien ficelées et on passe quelques heures agréables à les résoudre.   

 [h1]En conclusion : [/h1]
« Eventide : Slavic Fable », un jeu d’énigmes, d’objets cachés court et facile, qui vous divertira agréablement pendant quelques heures mais ne laissera pas une empreinte indélébile dans vos esprits. Je recommande plutôt en solde.  

[b]Bilan : 6/10[/b]

[h1]English summary : [/h1]
« Eventide : Slavic Fable » is a short and easy hidden objet’s game with many puzzle and mini-games. It will entertain you few hours but probably won’t be able to create a lasting impression on you. I recommend it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031213600', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1662216756}
review:
Schöne Musik und Szenerien. Unterhaltsame Minispiele und Wimmelbilder. Wenn man mal etwas ruhiges zum Nachdenken spielen möchte, ist das denke ich ganz gut geeignet.
Hab' die erste Geschichte in etwa 6 Stunden in mittlerer Schwierigkeit mit nur wenigen Tipps durchgespielt.
Die Bonusgeschichte habe ich in 40 Minuten geschafft.
Die Musik gefiel mir so gut, dass ich mir die Lieder abgespeichert habe. (Übrigens tolles Feature von den Entiwcklern)
Habe das Spiel in einem Random Key Pack für knapp über einen Euro bekommen mit mehreren anderen Wimmelbildspielen von Artifex Mundi. Für den Preis kann man sich nicht beklagen. :D
Für Vollpreis würde ich mir solche Spiele aber glaube ich nicht kaufen, es sei denn, Grafiken und Musik wären in viel höherer Qualität und die Stories und Spielverlauf komplexer und nicht-linear.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108964303', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1488059485}
review: Ładnie przygotowana wydmuszka bez polotu. Oprawa wizualna ładna, karty ze słowiańskimi potworkami i oczywiście motyw z kwiatem paproci jak najbardziej rokują na plus, ale co z tego jak reszta jest bardzo nijaka? Artifex ma zdecydowanie lepsze pozycje.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970710846', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1488540442}
review:
Bonjour a tous.

Concernant Eventide: Slavic Fable :

Très bon Artifex, une bonne histoire qui nous met bien dans l'ambiance, des scènes d'objets cachés travaillées, de même pour les puzzles même si dans l'ensemble je les es trouvés "classiques". On a aussi toujours les fameux items cachés à trouver et ça on aime bien héhé. Et une petite histoire en plus a debloquer quand on fini le jeu.

Graphiquement pas vilain du tout, très coloré et des animations de bonne qualité.

Des musiques superbes ce qui est assez rare car souvent très banales, ici je les es trouvés vraiment bien.

Donc tout ce qu'il faut pour que Eventide: Slavic Fable soit un bon jeu avec une durée de vie correct, il a grandement ca place dans la collection Artifex.

A conseiller a tous, aux experts comme aux débutants pas de soucis, n'hésitez pas un bon moment vous attends !

Sur ce bon jeu a tous !

author: {'steamid': '76561198046840300', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1487614722}
review:
Как здорово поехать к бабушке в домик в деревне. Точнее в заповедник, где милая старушка живет на лоне природы в гармонии с мифическими существами, которых, правда, отрицает современная наука. И сразу после приезда вы обнаруживаете, что ваш сосед хочет править миром с помощью древнего артефакта и вообще является тем еще козлом (в буквальном смысле). Но, пожалуй, чего-то такого стоило ожидать, ведь этот тип отстроил себе прямо в заповеднике огромный замок. Наверняка, вопреки законодательству об охране памятников природы! И теперь вместо того, чтобы кое-как поймать интернет 2G и устроиться в уютном месте, читая новости вконтакте, придется бродить по лесной чаще,  выручать бабушку вместе с добрыми духами и обламывать планы злодея.
 
Самое главное, что стоит сказать. Не надо рассматривать игру как справочник по славянской мифологии. Те существа, которых можно увидеть в уголках заповедника, имеют очень слабое отношение к вере наших предков. Их придумывали современные люди, возможно, даже не потомки славян. И мысли у этих людей явно были не о том, чтобы раскрыть тему славянской мифологии. Да, существуют игры, которые действительно достоверно рассказывают о национальных верованиях, например, Never Alone. Но, возможно, в той картине мира, которую они изображают, современному человеку, с гуманными ценностями, со знаниями, которые дает наука, будет… не комфортно.  Словом, «На закате» - это стилизация, игра по мотивам русских, украинских, польских и т.д. сказок. Кстати, не очень древних. По сравнению, например, с древнеегипетскими или древнегреческими мифами. Вообще тем, что о славянской мифологии известно мало, часто пользуются шарлатаны или даже сектанты, завлекая в свои сети людей, которых интересуют тайны и истории. На самом деле если бы действительно была какая-то великая мифология, то это бы до нас дошло не обрывками (те же древнегреческие мифы отлично известны). Хотя будет прекрасно, если игра послужит стимулом прочитать реальных исследователей (Рыбаков, Пропп, Афанасьев, Зеленин) или хотя бы сказки. 

Вот локализаторы тоже не почувствовали в этой игре «родные корни». Встречаются баги перевода (Банник, а не какой-то Банный, наверное). Еще момент, который мне не очень понравился, это [strike]внешность Боруты[/strike] то, что имя главной героини Машенька (Мэри) подавалось весьма навязчиво. Непонятно, зачем  тогда возможность придумать имя персонажа. Стараешься, называешь себя Нимфадора-Ифигения Фримен, а всю игру  к тебе обращаются  - Мэри. Бррр… Еще довольно любопытный момент: в середине игры героиня переплывает на лодке на другой берег, и часть карты становится недоступной. Как бы пути назад нет. Не знаю только, плохо это или хорошо.
 
Но сама игра очень красочная. Практически каждая локация колоритная и атмосферная. Эти потаенные лесные чащи наполнены жизнью и волшебством. Головоломки великолепны.  Есть даже такой новый для меня тип как «интерактивная история»: кликаешь или расставляешь по местам элементы головоломки, и проигрывается какая-то сценка с сюжетом. 
У это игры, безусловно, у нее есть свой стиль. Она действительно способна очаровать. Мне кажется, Artifex Mundi в этот раз превзошли самих себя. Несмотря на некоторые мелкие недочеты, это игра сделана на пять с плюсом.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972416553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 253, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1485021477}
review:
Artifex Mundi are really hitting their stride now, and are clearly the kings of the HOBO market. The graphics are always massively saturated, colourful and inspired, and the voice acting is more than acceptable for games of this sort. No, the puzzles aren't going to challenge you too much, but they're all logical and fair which I like. Probably could have done with a couple of extra HOBO scenes, they were a bit sparse and a little too easy, but still good fun to be had and the polish is increasing with every title. Bad transalations are almost non existent now, thank god!

Definitely a thumbs up for people who are a fan of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198227942340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1483624115}
review:
The game does not differ much from other Artifex Mundi games. The graphic is pretty, music is pleasant, and puzzles are not very difficult. I loved the Slavic folklore, so good to finally have something familiar and close instead of magic, which is usually the main part of each hopa game. 
The only negative thing, it is short. I have finished the whole game + extra chapter within 3.5h and I was taking my time.
Worth playing, but because of the length I would advise waiting for steam sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068842575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1482129065}
review:
I enjoyed the game I just wish the story was stronger personally.  Artifex Mundi's side characters and villains used to be far more memorable and it seems they are just meh now. Still it's a fun game, runs well, has nice music and art. So I can't bash it too much. It's a little overpriced right now, but that's most  Artifex Mundi games when they first hit steam. I'd suggest waiting for a steam sale and then pick this up. 

All in all I'd say: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198092065417', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1523621012}
review:
Pros:

Cute story
Lots of eye candy
Lovely music loop
Voices for the most part aren't bad

Cons:

Short
Extra story incredibly short, shorter than usual for an extra chapter in an Artifex Mundi game
Ending line in extra chapter feels forced...done just to link extra chapter to main game

Verdict:
Cute but short, somewhat visually stimulating.  Buy it when it's cheap or part of a bundle.  A decent quality but short title published by Artifex Mundi, one of the more prolific professional HOG purveyors on Steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085191239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1482345292}
review: Lubię gry typu hidden object. Polubiłam je jeszcze bardziej po znalezieniu gier Artifex Mundi. Slavic Fables jest jednym z najlepszych tutułów jakie wypuścili. Przez sam motyw słowiański, jak i ciekawe ujęcie diabłów, chochlików itp. Jestem bardzo zadowolona, że kupiłam tą grę. Polecam wszystkim!

author: {'steamid': '76561198170781338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 517, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1555701927}
review:
Eventide: Slavic Fable jest jedną z lepszych gier wydanych przez Artifex Mundi. Gra sięga do bardzo fajnego świata, gdzie przygoda czeka na Ciebie na każdym kroku. Dzięki przeniesieniu w świat związany ze Słowiańską historią przybliża graczowi mitologię tych kresów.

Ta gra jednocześnie uczy i bawi. 

Dla tych, którzy chcą się w ten sposób pobawić, serdecznie polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101239908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1480210135}
review:
Ya he jugado muchos juegos de esta desarrolladora y la verdad cada uno me va descepcionando mas uno tras otro... es el hecho que mezclan modos de juego tan pobres y mal implementados que es mas desesperante no por su complejidad sino por su sin sentido... no encajan en la trama ni nada... ahora si nos vamos al sentido comun para superar los acertijos, no tengo palabras para describirlos, no se que tipo de mentalidad tenian los desarrolladores o los de pruebas o el de produccion; se siente tremendamente forzado el avance y a veces hasta estupida la manera de resolverlo.
La verdad lo jugue porque lo compre del humble bundle y este ha sido por mucho el PEOR de todos.
Y si despues de leer esto lo compraras y jugaras, da click a lo pendejo por todos lados y usa todos los items, luego riete de como rompes un piedra con un pedazo de una bicicleta... pero no con una pala o un pico minero... o romper un vidrio con un anillo... pero no puedes usar un piedra, o el pico minero, o el tubo de bici, o una pala... No, tiene que ser con el puto anillo... por dios

author: {'steamid': '76561198045957548', 'num_games_owned': 920, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1479201667}
review:
Неплохая казуалка, поиск предметов, жанр говорит сам за себя. История со славянскими мифами, немного мистики, доброта и справедливость, как и во всех играх подобного жанра. Игра заберет пару дней вашей жизни, но если смотреть на нее, как на художественное произведение, то просто считайте, что вы прочитали очередную, не самую плохую, книгу.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198060000536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 855, 'last_played': 1488117543}
review:
Po długiej przerwie powróciłem do gier ze studia Artifex Mundi. Gra godna polecenia, porusza temat legend i wierzeń słowiańskich - czego tak dziś brakuje na rynku gier. Bardzo fajny motyw zbierania kart.

Zalety (jak w każdej grze z ich studia):
- muzyka
- grafika
- prosta i przyjemna
Oraz:
- zebranie 30/30 ukrytych przedmiotów nareszcie miało sens!

Wady (jak w każdej grze z ich studia ;) ):
- prosta
- drobne błędy w opisach do przedmiotów 
- niektóre animacje są "sztywne"

author: {'steamid': '76561198018671862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1455048620}
review:
W obecnej erze gier pełnych strzelania, napięcia itd. miło jest czasem usiąść i popracować czymś, co natura nam dała, ale sami niestety zaniedbujemy... mówię o mózgu.
Gry Artifex Mundi (wszystkie, bo łapię każdą, która wychodzi) mam na steamie, na tablecie, na komórce... wszędzie. Zarówno ja, jak i moja mama. Jesteśmy fankami i uwielbiamy szukać przedmiotów, rozwiązywać łamigłówki i odkrywać naprawdę ciekawe i piękne historie. Artifex Mundi nigdy nas pod tym względem nie zawiódł.
Dźwięki, grafika no i historia - zawsze coś ciekawego i oryginalnego. Aż chciałoby się siąść z ludźmi, którzy nad tym pracują, porozmawiać i powymieniać pomysłami :D
Niemniej dobrze jest czasem się wyciszyć i pomyśleć. Te gry są bardzo odprężające i ogromnie je wszystkim polecam - młodym, starym, fanom strzelanej, jak i RPG - bo gdy studia Artifex Mundi są pokarmem dla mózgu, z którego każdy chętnie skorzysta :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198189516483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 317, 'last_played': 1478788262}
review: As I am a constant player of this kind of games since I've discovered the genre long time ago, I'm now searching and enjoying three things during the action play : storyline, graphic concept and puzzle dificulty.For the first two subjects Eventide can easly get a ten.For the puzzle dificulty level I can say that it is a "sunday afternoon" game and can be easily played on hard mode with a 100% achievements gained in 3-4 hours by anyone.Overall yes, I recommend and I will for sure play the sequel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119374250', 'num_games_owned': 422, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1676320350}
review:
Ein wunderschönes Spiel mit liebevoll entworfenen Szenen, Charaktern und Spielelementen. Neben den klassischen Wimmelbildern gibt es auch immer wieder Minispiele wie beispielsweise Puzzles oder kleine Logikaufgaben. Die fantasievollen Bilder und die Geschichten über slawische Mythologie laden zum Träumen ein, unterstützt vom perfekt darauf abgestimmten Soundtrack im Hintergrund.
Ich kann das Spiel nur weiterempfehlen!

author: {'steamid': '76561198335334869', 'num_games_owned': 219, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1478255969}
review:
花了3小时多一点时间通了这个游戏，简单说一下。
Eventide: Slavic Fable，即黄昏：斯拉夫寓言是Artifex Mundi公司新近出的解谜游戏几乎没有瑕疵的一款。平心而论，作为AM公司游戏的半个收集者，真就没在这款游戏中找到瑕疵，哪怕是汉化翻译的错字。整个故事从展开到发展，直至结局，没有一丝赶工的痕迹也没有丝毫虎头蛇尾的感觉，可以说相当流畅。游戏的主题十分平易近人，充满童话色彩，相比AM公司其他一些冠有“童话”性质的标题作品，这款斯拉夫寓言要更接近童话这一概念。主线故事后的附属故事更是温馨感人，这种题材在AM公司的作品属于绝无仅有的。此外本作的隐藏收集例行分为两类，一类是紫色的花朵，一类是寓言卡片。相较AM的其他作，这作中的隐藏收集品算是相当醒目了。正因为隐藏要素较醒目，因此游戏时间上相对比AM的其他作品少了一些。其中寓言卡片收集完成后可以浏览相当多的神话知识，推荐玩这款游戏的玩家都要尝试收集全。毫不夸张地说，这个寓言卡片算是AM公司作品相当有意义的一个隐藏要素了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198007312632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 749, 'last_played': 1478198136}
review: Very interesting plot.  For a fairytale game it covers the territory with beauty and amazing graphics.  The bad guy was obvious to the little girl;  she forgot her instincts as she grew up and the story had a launching point.  The bond between the young woman and her grandmother was believable.  One complaint is that the grandmother is that she did not take caare of her appearance.  I have been taught as a registered nurse that if I do not take care of myself I will not be able to properly take of the people I am caring for.  I guess that was the point because she was kidnapped and tortured.  Anyway, I enjoyed the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094632071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1478118566}
review:
I am currently on a point and click games train where I am playing through a lot of them. Decided to write a review for one of them. So... If you enjoy point and click games this is good I guess. The thing that I do want to mention is writing. I found it abysmal. Every other sentence has to have word "slavic" in it. It is just so bad. My ears hurt every time I heard it. 

If this is story about slavic creatures, we can assume it is taking place in a slavic country. Now why would people from that country feel the need to mention word "slavic" so often. They wouldn't say "Those are creatures from slavic myths" they would just say "Those are creatures from myths". 

In the end no one will probably see this, but if you do, remember this is a game about slavic creatures, game sure won't let you forget that. 

Also there is one moment in a game that just made no sense. I know that point and click games, let's say, aren't always logical, but still. 
[spoiler]So at one poing you need to defeat flying monster. You are told to talk to the guy who did that before. When you talk to him however, he says that his body is in pain and he needs a bath to bring back his power. "Okay", I thought, "I will run him a bath and he will fight the monster with me", but no! After going through a lot of pointing and clicking he takes the bath. Once he is out, he thanks you and gives you a key to a tool used to defeat the monster! Just put it into perspective. I am on a mission to save all of the creatures including him, but instead of giving me the key he decided he wants to have a bath first![/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198053227328', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1477811876}

author: {'steamid': '76561198090366497', 'num_games_owned': 710, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1477434449}
review:
A lovely example of this genre. Despite the impending doom it plays at a very relaxed pace with a nice mix of (easy) puzzles, hidden object scenes and basic point n click elements. Some of the dialog is a little ropey but the story plays out nicely and there is a bonus (prequel) chapter once you are finished with the main story.

There is a sort of free play on the hidden object scenes available in the extras section and I do recommend looking at the beastiary cards you collect which detail various inhabitants from this mythology.

Very much enjoyed working my way through this one, so I would recommend it if you enjoy games like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027424772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1520554640}
review:
[b][u]Game Information[/u][/b]

"Eventide: Slavic Fable"  is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game. The game was developed by The House of Fables and published by Artifex Mundi.

"Slavic Fable" is the first episode of "Eventide."

Even though the game is not labelled as a collector's edition, it has some extra features that are not available in its' counterpart; the standard edition.

[b][u]The Game Review[/u][/b]

Game Visuals

I want to mention that the visuals in the game are nicely done. The visuals can be adjusted in the game's option menu.

Game Audio

I want to mention that audio for the game is well done. Even though the audio is somewhat simplistic and repetitive. The audio can be adjusted in the game's option menu as well.

Gameplay

There are three different difficulty game modes to choose from: Casual; Advanced and Expert.

The notebook keeps track of progression in the game. Such as story events and clues.

There is an interactive map in the game. It allows the player to fast travel between each location quickly without having the need to constantly backtrack. It also indicates that there are a variety of tasks that can be completed at various locations within the game. The interactive map is not automatically given at the start of the game. It also has a unique feature: the map can be flipped over to the other side.

There is no padlock feature that is available to lock the inventory panel in place. The inventory panel comes automatically stationary.

The hidden object scenes consist of the following: Find "x" amount; Fragmented items and Traditional word lists. Some of these hidden object scenes may require little or no interaction. Most of the hidden object scenes can be replayed in the game's extra feature section.

The puzzles are fairly easy to solve without having the need to skip any of them.

There are two collectibles in the game: Ethereal Flowers and Bestiary Cards. They are scattered throughout the game for the player to find.

There are twenty-five different achievements that can be unlocked from playing the game. Each of these achievements does come with some requirements that need to be completed before they can be unlocked.

Since this is a collector's edition, there is a bonus chapter, but it can be accessed only after the main story is completed.

Miscellaneous

There are extra features in the game: Bonus Chapter; Bonus Hidden Object Scenes; Wallpapers; Concept Art and Soundtracks. Most of these extra features can be accessed only after the entire game is completed.

There are five different trading cards to collect. Only three of those trading cards are given out by the game. There are several ways to get the rest of the trading card: Purchased from Steam's Community Market; Trade with friends; Booster Packs and its' Booster Pack Creator.

Final thoughts: I have found the game enjoyable to a certain extent. The replay value for the game is low. I would recommend this game, but not at the game's full price value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020125851', 'num_games_owned': 15680, 'num_reviews': 840, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1476016682}
review:
[h1]A Point & Click Adventure[/h1]
https://youtu.be/Z5ndcG8ZsQA
+ The gameplay is pretty straightforward consisting mostly of light puzzles and finding various objects to pass an obstacle or progress the story.
+ Beautiful backgrounds. Very colorful and detailed
+ Lots of animations in every scene that really brings the world to life
+ Great voice acting which matches the characters very well
+ Surprisingly realistic characters with animated facial expressions and mouth movements that sync with their voice which is very rare to find in Point & Click adventures. 
+ Personally, I'm not a big Point & Click fan because many games are overly difficult and require you to almost always use a guide. This game seems to be more casual while also giving you plenty of hints and/or skips if you feel like you are having a hard time.
+ Great soundtrack

author: {'steamid': '76561198161766766', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 397, 'last_played': 1483065639}
review:
本人的第一作解谜 打开了新世界的大门
看夫人玩过非常多Artifex Mundi 的解谜 只对这个起了兴趣并且在打折的时候买下 大概说一下首通的感受

-剧情 【7/10】
剧情吧 说不上太好 也不差 不是特别狗血也没有太惊艳 一贯的拯救家人以及世界【误 但是说实话对解谜游戏的剧情要求并不算太高 勉强能过及格分 [spoiler]不要吐槽Boss瞎的几乎跟没有一样的视力[/spoiler]长度也刚好 不过于冗长 也不会短的让你觉得不过瘾 大概就是自high的差不多的时候游戏就结束了

-解谜 【9/10】
个人认为这一作好就好在这里 谜题设置难度适中 对新手来说不用花过多时间 老手们当然会轻松不少 值得一提的是这作将物品的使用时机延长不少 很多东西攥在手里好久才派上用场 对新手来说有点迷雾效果吧 不知道究竟什么时候以及在哪里用 就容易卡关 [spoiler] 比如说纽扣开锁：）卡的我怀疑人生[/spoiler] 

寻物谜题难度个人感觉偏高 不是一般的在一堆东西里找出正确的 而是要在一堆差不多的东西里找出被藏得很深的正确物品 有两个寻物居然卡了我快五分钟 感觉不可思议hhh 最后看得眼睛都花了才找到 以及中间城堡走廊中那个Mosaic式的寻物很有意思 有种很舒服的宗教神圣感 和故事情节也算契合 

以及个人感觉非常加分的连环解谜 [spoiler]出现在海边雕像上的那个[/spoiler] 将物品放至正确位置便会给你下一个物品 接着再放至正确位置直到最后物品出现 非常有意思 想来其实也不太能算是解谜 但是非常有新意 感觉眼前一亮 而且操作起来很爽hhhhh总之在解谜上没有太多的扣分环节 实在有的话大概就是让我看的眼花的那两个寻物吧

-场景 【8/10】
画面清新 看着很舒服 森林部分还有很多细小的 和解谜无关的小互动 [spoiler] 地上会吐孢子的植物 杯子里点了会缩头的兔子和小鸟之类的[/spoiler] 非常可爱 玩的时候顺手戳戳算是调节心情吧hhhhh

-总体 【8/10】
值得一玩的好游戏 非常有意思 玩完之后立马想再玩一遍的类型 [spoiler]然后疯狂向周围的人安利[/spoiler] 从此估计掉进解谜大坑了吧 BTW 这一作的翻译还成 不算太差 但是能看得懂英文的建议还是英文 毕竟解谜游戏 意思削微的偏差就有可能导致判断失误

总之祝大家玩的开心 我要去剁手买多几个来玩了 [spoiler]笔记本带不起屁股所以只能玩解谜了hhh没有屁股我要死了[/spoiler] 第一次写这么长的评价好方啊 希望能给各位提供参考 P.S.还有什么好玩的解谜欢迎推荐！游戏荒中。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198166379868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1546122544}
review:
C'est véritablement un de mes jeux préférés d'Artifex Mundi, l'ambiance fantasy slave est vraiment géniale, j'ai découvert quelques créatures (mais bon, il est vrai que je ne suis pas calée en mythologie slave et c'est un tort). Donc, pour le coup, qu'est-ce qu'il vaut ce petit jeu ?
Eh bien, pas mal du tout:
 - l'animation a quelques mauvais traits (à une ou deux reprises) mais rien d'horripilant non plus, c'est largement passable,
 - ensuite l'histoire, eh bien elle est plutôt prenante, et personnellement elle m'a beaucoup plu,
 - les jeux, plutôt divers et variés certains sont assez difficiles et d'autres d'une facilité déconcertante mais il y a au moins du niveau,
 - la durée de vie est bonne, comptez bien 5 heures de jeu, plus si vous voulez tous les trophées comme moi (faire le jeu en mode expert, essayer d'attraper tous les objets cachés...)

Conclusion : un excellent jeu d'Artifex Mundi, juste une question: à quand la suite ? :p

author: {'steamid': '76561198247984964', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1472856427}
review: I played this game after completing the Enigmatis and Grim Legends series. While I didn't feel this game was as strong as those, I really enjoyed it and thought the art was beautiful. Another solid game from Artifex Mundi!

author: {'steamid': '76561197988271944', 'num_games_owned': 1346, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1472406033}
review:
Devo dire che la Artifex ha fatto giochi migliori.

Questo loro prodotto mi è piaciuto molto meno rispetto ad altri. Mi è parso troppo semplice. 

Ovviamente rimane sempre un prodotto di nicchia, mirato per quegli amanti dei punta e clicca ma il tocco "Artifex" rimane sempre. Consigliato scontato o da bundle.

Voto 6,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198083097958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 371, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1472383001}
review:
結論言うと面白いです。

内容はファンタジー絡みの探偵物と言ったところでしょうか？
週末に軽く楽しむ、短編や中篇程度の小説のように楽しむことができます。

総当りクリックのアドベンチャー・ゲームに特有の同じ場所を行ったり来たりして時間を費やされる事も、
ヒント機能が非常に充実しているのでテンポを崩さず物語に集中できます。
次の行き先やアクション、パズルにもヒントは適用されるのでまずストレスが溜まるということもないでしょう。
パズルについては面倒ならスキップまでできてしまいます。

興味があれば購入しても損は無いと思いますよ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198041678165', 'num_games_owned': 571, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1479754861}
review:
Очередной шедевр от разработчика The House Of Fables и издателей Artifex Mundi, я в восторге! Как всегда мы имеем восхитительные художественные локации, наполненные магией и волшебством, добрую сказку, множество головоломок и интересных персонажей. Всё это сопровождается ненавязчивой приятной музыкой. 
Хочу также сказать, что игра проходится за один вечер и даёт человеку расслабиться, так что приготовьте чашечку какао и погружайтесь в сказочный мир ^_^

Очень приятно удивили 30 карт, которые разбросаны по всем локациям, они описывают существ славянской мифологии, весьма полезно и интересно.
Спасибо за игру, продолжайте в том же духе, ждём продолжения! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198078482246', 'num_games_owned': 10604, 'num_reviews': 328, 'playtime_forever': 537, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 537, 'last_played': 1470387073}
review:
这款做的相当好玩，和以前几部的改变比较大，剧情很长，谜题比以往的都难些。收集品做的不错，不过有个bug。就是收集品第一周目没集全没关系（比如一周目收集了29张），进行二周目游戏再搜集1张重复的卡片就能解锁成就。成就计算的是花的数目和卡片的数目，而不是地点和种类。
There is no need to collect all flowers and cards if you want to get achievements.If you could not collect all in the first through,you can start the game again.Then if you collected 27 cards in the first time,you only need to collect the first three cards to unlock achievements.It is based on the number you collected, not the types.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961256731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 442, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1558736454}
review:
a very short but decent HOG from Artifex Mundi which is a guarantee for high quality HOG.

pros.
high resolution.
good sound tracks.
decent story.
great graphics.

cons.
very very short. main story= less than two and half hours. bonus story = around half hour.
WAY TOO EASY.


for hardcore HOG fans is a should buy. but definatly not for the full price. that price for the length of the gameplay time is not fair. 

I highly recommend that game on sale or from a bundle.

i give the game 7/10 due to the short time of gameplay +1 for cards =8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198317858314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2727, 'last_played': 1517436678}
review: Decent game--would have liked to have to found more hidden objects. A good game,  Just needed more spice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002506911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 415, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1468692339}
review: It's time to save Grandma from the clutches of evil.  This follows the typical greatness that Artifex Mundi offers in all of its hidden object games.  The graphics are great, the storyline is unnecessary, the voice acting is mediocre, but the fun of the puzzles and hidden object games are great.  This game was short and fairly easy.  I found the hidden object scenes weren't as typical as you would expect, while some were tough.  The atypical HOS were find an object, place it where it fits, which gives you another object and then find where that goes, and so on and so forth.  It was a good break from the typical HOS, but felt too easy.  The puzzles were good, but nothing extravagant that made it too difficult to move forward.  As usual easy achievements for those hunters out there.  Definitely recommend it if you love these types of games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088233033', 'num_games_owned': 1832, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1479936004}

author: {'steamid': '76561198088679718', 'num_games_owned': 896, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 287, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 287, 'last_played': 1461434043}
review:
★★★★★★☆☆☆☆

OK, I must confess I just love that little HOPA games from Artifex Mundi. If you're looking for chilling, point&click adventure, [b]Eventide: Slavic Fable[/b] is good choice. If you've played AM games, you know what to expect - incredible HDR-like graphics (just look on the screenshots), pleasant music, simple story and easy mechanics. A distinctive element of this particular game is the main theme - Slavic tales, however I expected something a bit deeper and less infantile.

review: 很有意思的故事情节，难度也不是很大，这类游戏都是套路，熟悉了以后基本上很快就可以过关，就是有些东西没有找齐，花还差几朵，碎片也差一些，消遣打发时间的利器。

author: {'steamid': '76561198100994803', 'num_games_owned': 2325, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1467808391}
review:
As per usual, Artifex Mundi put out another high quality hidden object game. Game takes about 2 hours or so.

Graphically its not bad. Animations arent that great, but the backgrounds and still shots are beautiful (as you can see from the store page screenshots). Audio was pretty good. Music got a little old after awhile, but the sound effects were nice. Voice acting was better than Im used to from a hidden object game, which was a nice surprise. 

Puzzles were your standard issue hidden object game puzzles. None of them were overly difficult, and if youve played other hidden object games, then youll recognize some repeated puzzle styles. 

Where this game really shined for me, was the story. Slavic folklore is a pretty interesting topic for a story (in my opinion anyway), and I felt they did a pretty good job incorporating it into a lighter-hearted video game.  Without spoiling too much, the game had a cool side achievement for collecting these lore cards that were pretty cool reads if you wanted even more insight into the creatures in the lore, as well as some of the characters you meet. That said, the story still follows the "person gets kidnapped, you must rescue said person" plot line that crops up pretty often in these.  May or may not be a deal breaker for some if theyre looking for something new.

The only bugs I found were when I was doing a speed playthrough to complete an achievement I missed. If I cleared an area too quickly (picked up all the objects rapidly), the game wouldnt recognize that it was cleared and would let me keep opening that spot. Example off the top of my head being the crawfish cage and the toolbox in the boat house. When I played normally (and not spam clicking through), the game was perfect.

Overall, the puzzles were a bit same-y, but if youre into fantasy or folklore at all, the story was more than interesting enough to give this a big recommendation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086170655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1467726400}
review:
No cóż :) Studio Artifex Mundi po raz kolejny pokazuje klasę. Gra Eventide: Slavic Fable jest nie tylko wykonaną bardzo estetycznie i wciagajacą grą z gatunku przygodówka/ ukryte obiekty/ casual. To co ją wyróznia to fabuła oparta na słowiańskich podaniach i legendach: występuję min. baba, diabeł Boruta, oraz stworzenia znane ze słowiańskiej mitologii. Uważam, że tego typu pomysł to istny strzał w dziesiątkę i pewna nowość w grach komputerowych w ogóle (oczywiście wiem, że w Wiedźminie też mamy strzygi, utopce itd). Dodatkowym atutem gry są niewątpliwie karty do zebrania (trzy), oraz ciekawie pomyslane osiągnięcia steam: niezbyt trudne, aczkolwiek wymagające spostrzegawczości.
Wady? Jak we wszystkich grach AM kuleje animacja 3D, twarze postaci czasami są nieco szkaradne, gra jest casualem, ale co niektórzy pewnie by mogli ponarzekać na długość gry: z dodatkiem około 2-3 godzin. Jednak jest to gra do której można czasami wrócić (cchocby po to aby zdobyć osiągnięcia wszystkie :) ). Polecam! Kawał rzetelnej roboty zrobionej z sercem!

author: {'steamid': '76561198114306396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1467473441}
review:
这游戏是我最近玩这类解密小游戏里面美工最好之一，游戏里面没有太多的寻物谜题也被组合一个道具所代替
但是这个游戏后期就加入了些寻物谜题感觉像是开发时候做到后期没灵感了拿寻物谜题凑谜题这样。。。。。
剧情也不错，成就都比较好拿就是每个画面记得找花和卡片[spoiler] 【有几个卡片在只能在有些只出现一次的场景里面拿，错过该场景就只能二周目拿了】[/spoiler] ，自己在最后忘点了最后一本书导致玩二周目才全成就，为自己的蠢点个蜡烛

author: {'steamid': '76561198314715511', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1467456761}
review:
Just started to play hidden object games and this is my 4th game. With great graphics and 3D models, rich of collective items and really not so hard to get all of them without any tips. Even like me not very good at puzzle game, the main story can be played without using any hints. (the Casual difficulty) There are total 23 mini games, they will obviously take some time to solve but it is a big fun to play with. Also, the main purpose is clear and story runs smooth. I love those 30 cards which introduce 30 kinds of the mysterious creatures. Especially the sub chara is very adorable, good to see such character appears in game.

The additional story is a nice epsiode for player to enjoy the fern flower story in another character's view. I hope to play another game produced by Artifex Mundi, maybe Nightmares from the Deep will be my next choice ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198172454749', 'num_games_owned': 2937, 'num_reviews': 313, 'playtime_forever': 416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 415, 'last_played': 1476289521}
review:
[h1]대체적으로 쉬우면서 편하게 즐길수 있는 히든 오브젝트게임[/h1]

아티펙스 먼디 게임답게 그래픽도 뛰어나고 스토리도 비교적 괜찮은 수준으로 플레이타임 3시간 정도로 적당한 분량의 게임이다.
이런 히든 오브젝트게임들은 3~4시간이 제일 적당하다고 생각한다.
3시간보다 짧으면 너무 부실하고 4시간을 넘어가면 스토리가 상당히 긴편에 속한다.
그런점에서는 이 게임이 스토리 분량은 아주 적당하고 미니게임이나 숨은그림찾기도 평균 수준의 난이도를 보여준다.

도전과제들이 대체적으로 쉬운편인데,
1회차로도 충분히 100% 완료가 가능하다.
다만, 처음부터 전문가모드로 해야 하는 것과 도전과제 중에 몇가지 신경을 쓸것이 있는데,
박물관 안의 생명체(또는 요정)들과 대화하기와 동물카드 모두 찾기, 천상의 꽃 찾기, 모든 메모 다 읽기 등은 게임하다가 하나 둘씩 잊어먹고 그냥 지나치기 쉬우므로 가이드를 보면서 하는게 좋다고 생각한다.

그리고 오프닝 영상이나 중간에 나오는 영상들은 절대로 스킵을 해서는 안된다.
모두 다 보는것도 도전과제에 포함되어있으므로 빠짐없이 다 보도록 하자.
본 게임 끝나고 추가 스토리가 있으므로 이것까지 마무리해야 모든 도전과제가 언락된다.
서브 스토리에 대한 도전과제가 하나 있으므로 빠트리지 않도록 하자.
서브 스토리는 20~30분 정도 분량으로 금방 끝나므로 편하게 즐기면서 모든 도전과제를 달성하도록 하자.

전체적으로 편하게 부담없이 즐긴 히든 오브젝트 게임으로 머지않아 이 게임의 후속작이 나온다고 하니 기대를 해본다.
편하게 즐긴만큼 이 게임을 한 유저들 또한 99%가 긍정적으로 추천한 게임이다.
이런 게임이야 말로 진정으로 캐주얼하고 힐링하게 하는 게임이라고 생각한다.

단 한가지 아쉬운 점은 한글화는 되어있지만 뛰어쓰기가 안되어있다보니 읽는데
조금 애로사항이 있다. 그 점은 주위할 것!!



평점 80점.

author: {'steamid': '76561198127510700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 257, 'last_played': 1465641829}

author: {'steamid': '76561198042831386', 'num_games_owned': 598, 'num_reviews': 627, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1461498121}
review:
[h1]Short version: 82%[/h1]
Eventide is a typical craftsmen work of a hidden object game. It uses well-known mechanics and story type (granddaughter saving grandma and cute creatures from evil demon), but it knows how to use them well.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
One of the banes of hidden object games is that they all can feel relatively the same. For example, if you think about a typical modern HOG with all of the usual HOG elements, you think about a game like Eventide: Slavic Fable.

Not that it’s a bad thing; Eventide knows its trade well. With its great graphics and enjoyable hidden/fragmented object scenes, there isn’t much that can be said against it. Well, okay, the map system is barely useful and it really needs more puzzles over the point ‘n’ click style item management. 

The story also likes to stay on known waters: our heroine has to go on a journey to save her grandmother from the clutches of an evil Slavic half-demon, and to do so, she gets help from other Slavic creatures. By the way, the game really wants to remind everyone that it is about Slavic folklore. Maybe a little too much…

author: {'steamid': '76561198145379093', 'num_games_owned': 806, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1465538792}
review:
Das Wimmelbildspiel hat mir sehr gut gefallen.
Man taucht in eine märchenhafte Atmosphäre ab und klickt sich durch die Story; ein Bonuskapitel ist ebenfalls enthalten. Grafik ist für ein HOG gut, sehr liebevoll gestaltet. Die Wimmelbilder und Rätsel waren nach meinem Empfinden eher einfach. Die Musik ist schön, passend zur Atmosphäre sehr sanft und gut zum Entspannen.
Errungenschaften sind leicht mit 100% zu erreichen, es genügt auch ein Spieldurchlauf für 100%. 
Sammelkarten gibt es ebenfalls.
Wer gerne solche Spiele spielt, sollte dieses nicht auslassen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163926961', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1466014049}
review: Akcja "Eventide: Słowiańskiej baśni" toczy się w parku, swoistym rezerwacie, który prowadzi babcia "głównej bohaterki". Żyją tam sobie spokojnie stworki znane z baśni i legend, które pomagają w prowadzeniu osady, ale ta sielanka nie podoba się panu pobliskiego zamku - Borucie, który porywa babcię i pragnie poznać tajemnicę magicznego kwiatu paproci. Tak mniej więcej przedstawia się fabuła gry od Artifex Mundi, w której jak zwykle, oprócz ciekawej historii, możemy znaleźć klimatyczną muzykę i śliczną grafikę. Zagadki i scenki HO nie są za trudne, ale przyznam, że zdenerwowała mnie zagadka oddzielania od siebie pływających elementów ;) Gra jest godna polecenia, szczególnie dla miłośników gier typu HO :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198306050568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 900, 'last_played': 1465916416}
review:
First time I have played a whole game by myself. It was fairly easy to navigate, but I had to ask for hints occassionally. Once completed it unloked a secondary game, which was very rewarding.
If you like point and click puzzle games, it is a good choice.
I was surprised how many times I had to go back to a scene already investigated , and solved, to find that it had another task to complete.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041378982', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 436, 'last_played': 1465934524}
review:
Bardzo dobrze opowiedziana historia - chociaż z tymi słowiańskimi elementami bym nie przesadzał. Osadzona w mitologi słowiańskiej ale nie tylko nie wymaga jej znajomości, ale potraktowana bardzo powierzchownie. Kwiat paproci, dwa czy trzy stworzenia z legend to moim zdaniem zbyt mało by nadać grze podtytuł - Słowiańska Baśń. 

Hidden Object dopiero od drugiej połowy gry - co mnie zaskoczyło. Wcześniej trzeba było jedynie odpowiednio łączyć przedmioty i rozwiązywać zadania logiczne by posuwać się do przodu. W pierwszej częśći gra szła więc łatwo i można było skupić się opowiadanej historii, tym bardziej, że powiązania i lokacje są logicznie powiązane. Aż tu nagle, od połowy gry, trzeba szukać lokacji z ukrytymi przedmiotami - czasem nawet cofnąć się by taką lokację znaleźć, i otrzymać z niej przedmiot bez którego nie posuniemy się do przodu.

Gra niezła ale mało wymagająca. 
Zadania nie są trudne, a ilość lokacji HO jest zdecydowanie mniejsza niż w innych grach Artifex Mundi. Poziom Ekspert więc obowiązkowy ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198052965201', 'num_games_owned': 1046, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1526655835}
review: This is a nice little puzzler set in a world where Slavic myths are still alive and well and sustained by magic and human faith. The setting is refreshing in its subject matter and it was nice to explore a location completely centered around a mythology that doesn't get used very often.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137502098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1465488321}
review: Gra się w Eventide bardzo przyjemnie i mozna się przy niej nieźle bawić. Spodobał mi sie słowiański charakter gry i postacie w niej występujące. Jednak na tle innych gier tego wydawnictwa wydaje się za prosta a zakończenie trochę rozczarowuje. Zatem zdecydowanie polecam dla maniaków tego studia, jednak dla graczy bardziej wymagających odradzam.  Artifex Mundi ma wiele innych tytułów które są lepsze i które można polecać w ciemno :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198230021992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1497216263}
review:
Ein sehr wunderschönes Point&Click Abenteuer. Die Musik ist sehr melodisch und beruhigend. Die Animationen sind sehr detailreich und mit viel Liebe gestaltet. Die meisten Mini-Spiele sind altbekannt und doch unterscheiden sie sich von anderen Spielen von Artifex Mundi im Detail. Dafür sind die Point&Click Rätsel teilweise oft sehr anspruchsvoll im positiven Sinne. Die Charaktere sind sympathisch und man findet sich gleich von Anfang an mitten drin in einer Welt voller Fabeln und Mythen. Auch die Video-Szenen sind traumhaft schön!
Dieses Spiel ist wirklich sehr gelungen! Wer Phantasie, Point&Click und Wimmelbild mag, sollte sich dieses Spiel wirklich nicht entgehen lassen! Auch für Liebhaber von "Grimmige Legenden" ist Eventide wirklich ideal :)
Ich hoffe sehr auf Eventide 2 ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198018649889', 'num_games_owned': 789, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1461743183}
review:
This game is one of the best hidden object game I've played so far.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
[*]Great graphics.
[*]Fantastic music. It's very soothing and incredibly pleasant to listen to.
[*]Good user interface.
[*]Quick travel makes navigation really great.
[*]This game is fairly long (for the genre). The bonus chapter is short but nice.
[*]Good variety of puzzles.
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
[*]The puzzles are nice, but they are way too easy to pose any challenge.
[/list]

If you've never played a hidden object game, try this.
If you don't like this game, then this genre is not for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195237622', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 389, 'last_played': 1461524872}
review: İlk defa bir oyun satın aldım gayet güzel bir oyundu. Tek bir kötü yanı var o da diğer Artifex Mundi oyunlarını satın almak için sabırsızlandırması. Bulmaca çözmeyi seviyorsanız birazda ingilizceniz varsa hiç düşünmeden alın derim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110483386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 151, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1461005270}
review: I enjoyed this one more than any other HO game so far. There are different types of puzzles and HO scenes, so it doesn't get too repetitive, which is so often the case (and then I start using hints and skipping puzzles). This is also the first HO game in which I did not use any hints in the HO scenes and didn't skip any puzzles. The difficulty level was just right, so those didn't get frustrating. The story is interesting enough and I liked the graphics, especially the different creatures in the Moorland park. Finding the collectables wasn't too hard, although I managed to miss a few of the cards. I'm looking forward to the second part, which I will buy when it becomes available.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074744887', 'num_games_owned': 1511, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1460914386}

author: {'steamid': '76561198194289627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1667993709}
review:
(Note: my "play time" in Steam is under-stated because i played through this on Android, not Steam.)

Eventide is every bit as good as Enigmatis 2, if not better, and the theme likely has a wider appeal (while also being 100% family-friendly, unlike Enigmatis 2). It's possibly not as engrossing, as it's missing the "investigation chart" from Enigmatis 2, but it nonetheless sports the same production quality. The activation zones in the puzzle involving several wooden figures are "way off" (tried 3 times without success before Hint told me that it was indeed possible), but the rest is excellent - graphics, audio, pacing, characters, object interaction. Eventide and Enigmatis 2 easily set a new standard for Artifex Mundi quality, and i hope they make more titles like these, rather than more like their Time-traveler series.

If every HOPA were as well-made as this one, the world would be a happier place. i simply can't say enough good things about Eventide.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108201998', 'num_games_owned': 1120, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 897, 'last_played': 1460321440}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007360038', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1460199983}
review:
Eventide: Slavic Fable is a charming point-and-click adventure that's a pleasant change from the current crop of twitchy games. It may tax your memory and observation skills at times, but the unobtrusive hint system is only ever a click away. No tutorial needed: I jumped straight in at 'advanced'. Along the way you get occasional pats on the back to reassure you you're on the right track.

If forced to point out flaws, I'd say that the developers could do with a thorough spell-check of the content; there are several phrases and words used that aren't quite right (in some puzzles the odd choice of words adds further depth). Apart from that, the program seems bug-free [spoiler](except perhaps near the castle drawbridge, where the crossbow seemed to misfire -- I was forced to back out via the main menu to get around that)[/spoiler].

Well worth the entry fee.

author: {'steamid': '76561198283082872', 'num_games_owned': 1554, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1467974010}
review:
喜加一。
玩了一点点，[spoiler]上来就飞出一只大怪兽啊好可怕！[/spoiler]哈哈哈哈。
简单说这个游戏就是这里点点那里点点，看哪里能点开就把物品放在另外的地方。完全鼠标操作，没有操作难度，但是比较需要耐心，要琢磨哪里和哪里是一对的。比较适合无聊打发时间，玩起来也不累。原价买的话感觉不太值[spoiler]，但是提示有慈善包，喜+1党可以自己找找看，如果喜欢这种类型的游戏，慈善包还是很超值的[/spoiler]。
虽然这种慢吞吞的游戏不太是我的菜，但是原生简体中文好评吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198033995360', 'num_games_owned': 2161, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1459321554}
review: Eventide n'est qu'un petit jeu d'aventure, petit par sa longueur, son ambition ou le challenge qu'il propose. Mais, caché derrière une colorimétrie facile qui abuse des jeux du bleu et de l'orange, son corps est naturellement beau. Même sans le fard de ses effets de lumière, de ses pluies de feuilles et de ses animations généreuses. De l'autre côté des artifices, le plaisir d'en regarder le fond. De le regarder plus près, l'oeil arrondi en loupe, pour y piocher les pixels manquants. D'entrer dans le ventre millénaire d'un arbre peuplé d'oiseaux qui y volent, y remuent le vent dans tous les sens. Et, derrière cette vie simulée, de beaux dessins. Des paysages dans lesquels on veut se perdre. Un nouveau monde. Eventide, trajet fléché entre les attractions d'un parc à thèmes pris en otage par des forces maléfiques, est le penchant adorable d'Enigmatis 2. Ceux qui allument leur écran pour s'en aller loin, embarquent dans l'avion de la [i]point & click airline[/i] pour des voyages impossibles devraient marquer d'une croix leur agenda, se promettre un jour de faire escale au pays des fables slaves. Bref, appuyer sur le bouton ''ajouter à sa liste de souhaits''. Il y a des créatures assez rares pour qu'on ait l'instinct de les approcher, des routes qui sont assez calmes, des musiques qui sont assez douces pour qu'on en reparte avec un morceau d'elles dans le coeur, des souvenirs avec lesquels se promener. Et l'envie, même si elle ne durera qu'une heure, qu'ils meurent le plus tard possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058682669', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1476510878}
review:
This is a typical Artifex Mundi creation. If you've never played one before it's a puzzle and hidden object driven game with, to me at least, a reasonable storyline. I found that this one had a good mix of different puzzles and if you are practised with the genre it shouldnt take you long to comlete the story.

All in all it is a worthwhile couple of hours of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014869658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1458509443}
review:
This is just about my ideal Artifex Mundi game. Really gorgeous music and lovely art. Cute voiceovers, extremely enunciated, hehe--I always love That Guy Who Plays The Bad Guy (he's a few characters in this one). The puzzles were good, if on the easy side. Collecting bestiary cards is a great idea. Also, I'm not sure this is a plus for everyone, but I laughed every time the word "Slavic" came up, like an exotic callout that doesn't actually mean anything. Don't go in expecting historical accuracy or anythin'. But it is cute, and they did borrow elements from real mythology, just toned down or modified and given really generic English names. It was a very cute game overall.

My only change would be to make the map a better map--rooms are gathered into chunks so map-teleportation is handy but not as handy as it could be.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273119044', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 235, 'last_played': 1459288299}
review:
This is a really lovely game.  It only took about 4 hours to complete, but totally hooked me in.  

It looks beautiful, and creates a great atmosphere.  The music is very calming, with little surges when you solve puzzles. The puzzles aren't too hard, and there's always the hint flower if you're getting stuck.

The thing I most liked about it was how it created a world of abundant nature, and mythical creatures.  You come away with a taste for a time when the boundaries between human and animal were much more blurred.  A nice tribute to Slavic folklore.

Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016225906', 'num_games_owned': 374, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 351, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1458480869}
review:
[h1]Plus:[/h1]


+ najlepsza gra HOPA od Artifex Mundi w jaką miałem okazję zagrać (a grałem już w wiele tego typu gier)

+ świetna i wciągająca historia

+ bajeczna oprawa wizualna, ręcznie rysowane grafiki

+ ścieżka dźwiękowa

+ niesamowity słowiański klimat wylewa się z ekranu

+ sporo zaczerpnięć ze słowiańskiego bestiariusza

+ ciekawe zagadki wymagające skupienia

+ przyłożenie wagi do szczegółów

+ dobry stosunek ceny do zawartości

+ długość gry na poziomie 5h w trybie eksperta wraz z dodatkową przygodą


[h1]Minus:[/h1]


- brak


[h1]Ocena: 3,5/5[/h1]

1 – gniot, którego dotknięcie patykiem powoduje długotrwały uraz 
2 – można zagrać ale niekoniecznie 
3 – ciekawa pozycja ale sporo jej jeszcze brakuje do ideału
4 - solidna pozycja, zapewnia świetną zabawę na długie godziny, posiada minimalne błędy 
5 – trzeba zagrać, tytuł zasługujący na miano gry roku

author: {'steamid': '76561198132857683', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1459158476}
review:
To jest dopiero moja druga gra tego typu, więc prawdopodobnie za wiele do gadania nie mam, ale muszę przyznać, że podobała mi się. Grafika świetnie wykonana (chodzi mi tu o tła, sceny z szukaniem obiektów i same koncepty postaci), jednak przy animacji postaci jest już trochę gorzej. Muzyka bardzo mi się podobała i pasowała do klimatu. Odniosłam lekkie wrażenie, że nie było za dużo ścieżek dźwiękowych (nie wiem na pewno, nie wsłuchiwałam się). Co do głosów bohaterów mogłabym mieć pewne zastrzeżenia, że tu brak emocji, tam za cicho, tam coś tam i tam coś tam, bla bla bla... ale tak naprawdę tylko tak upierdliwe i czepliwe osoby jak ja na to narzekają, prawda?
 Z resztą, powiem w prost: dla łowców osiągnięć i kolekcjonerów ta gra to prawdziwa gratka. Można szukać różowych oczojebnych kwiatków i ukrytych kart kolekcjonerskich ze stworami z mitologii słowiańskiej i dostać ku... ekhem... gorączki, gdy brakuje ci jednej karty i musisz grę przejść jeszcze raz od początku, żeby kartę znaleść przylepioną do jakiejś tabliczki, której wcześniej nie przeczytałeś. No i fakt, że niektóre rzeczy w tej grze są trudne do ogarnięcia i trochę nielogiczne [spoiler](np. znalazłeś sygnet z rubinem - co robisz?: a) zatrzymujesz dla siebie, b) dajesz jakiemuś NPC, żeby ruszył swój tyłek z twojej drogi, c) przecinasz nim szybę)[/spoiler].
 Ale czego by tu oczekiwać? Osobom, które nie lubia tego typu gier, łatwo się zniechęcają, nie lubia zagadek logicznych po prostu nie polecam. Jak ktoś chce spróbować czegoś nowego i nie jest na 100% pewien, to jak najbardziej zachęcam po prostu kupić grę na przecenie. Co do miłośników gatunku: sami zdecydujcie czy warto, wy się lepiej znacie niz ja.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287802084', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 825, 'last_played': 1516240478}

author: {'steamid': '76561198093837561', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 1122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1558189342}
review:
Mogę śmiało powiedzieć, że Eventide jest jedną z najlepszych gier w jakie grałem. Według mnie  Slavic Fable to jedna z najlepiej wykonanych gier Artifexu, zarówno pod względem graficznym jak i również fabularnym. 

[h1]OPRAWA[/h1]
Znajdziemy tu cudowną, ręcznie rysowaną grafikę, każda lokacja jest bardzo szczegółowa, animacje posatci również nie pozostawiają zbyt wiele do życzenia. Udźwiękowienie stoi na bardzo wysokim poziomie, jest to gra przy, której możemy się wyciszyć, więc usłyszymy wiele odgłosów przyrody na przykład śpiew ptaków, szum wody itp. Ogólnie przyjemna dla oka i ucha.

[h1]PRZYGODA[/h1]
W grze wcielamy się w botaniczkę, która ma na swoim koncie uratowanie wielu kwiatów na skraju wyginięcia. Pewnego dnia dostajemy list od swojej babci, która prosi ją o pomoc w uratowaniu magicznego kwiatu paproci. Podczas swojej przygody spotykamy wiele sympatycznych stworzeń, znajdziemy tu również czarny charakter, który zrobi wszystko aby nam przeszkodzić w dotarciu do celu. Jest to wciągająca historia, której tak szybko nie zapomnimy.

[h1]PODSUMOWANIE[/h1]
Jest to gra skierowana do wszystkich odbiorców, od dzieci do osób starszych. Nie potrzebujemy mocnego laptopa aby zagrać w Eventide, co sprawia, że możemy zabrać grę na wakacje i różnego typu wyjazdy aby się trochę zrelaksować. Trafimy na wiele łamigłówek i scen z ukrytymi obiektami, więc uaktywnienie szarych komórek jest nieuniknione :)

[h1]DLA TYCH, KTÓRZY NIE LUBIĄ CZYTAĆ[/h1]
+ Piękna, ręcznie rysowana grafika
+ Wciągająca przygoda
+ Dobre udźwiękowienie
+ Nawiązanie do baśni z naszych regionów
+ Stworzenia, które spotykamy po drodze
+ Ciekawe zagadki
+ Sceny z ukrytymi obiektami
+ Łatwe osiągnięcia
+ Polski produkt

Jak dla mnie 10/10
POLECAM !!!!

Jeżeli moja recenzja pomogła Ci przy podjęciu decyzji nad zakupem, będę wdzięczny jeśli ją ocenisz/skomentujesz, co jest dla mnie ogromną motywacją do pracy nad kolejnymi tekstami.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969267147', 'num_games_owned': 7582, 'num_reviews': 572, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1458020104}
review:
A charming little casual point-and-click adventure, with pleasant music and at times delightful graphics. Though the story is quite thin, it still manages to provide some character and a distinct Slavic fairytale flair.

Note that it's especially casual: the game is quite short, even when including the bonus chapter, and the puzzles are all very easy. Also, there are only a handful of hidden-object scenes, so it's not exactly a hidden-object game.

Finally, thank you, devs, for supporting Linux!

author: {'steamid': '76561198074672646', 'num_games_owned': 6653, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1454586049}
review:
[h1]Eventide: Slavic Fable est un jeu d’objets cachés[/h1]

C’est un jeu d’aventure de type point & click avec des mini-jeux dont une majorité de jeux d’objets cachés.

Le studio qui a produit Eventide est Artifex Mundi. Si vous ne les connaissez pas encore, c’est LE studio spécialisé dans ce genre de jeux d’aventure et ce sont définitivement les meilleurs.

L’histoire ? Il s’agit de sauver un parc hébergeant des créatures provenant de contes et légendes géré par votre grand-mère.

Une chose que j’aime bien, c’est qu’en plus du jeu principal, vous avez un mini-jeu supplémentaire que vous pourrez jouer uniquement lorsque le premier jeu sera achevé.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=628484632

[url=www.graal.fr/2016/02/05/test-eventide-la-version-pour-steam/]Pour découvrir l’ensemble des mes impressions sur Eventide: Slavic Fable.[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561197973230221', 'num_games_owned': 14323, 'num_reviews': 849, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1457954096}
review: The first Steam game from developer The House Of Fables and it has nearly Artifex Mundi Quality. The story is good-great like the enemy. The graphics are good, most time very detailed, some persons could could drawn a little bit better, but its good enough, the most picturs are well-fantastic designed (for hidden object games standard), the search screens make fun, some are really beautiful like the glass one. Sound is good. Game length is adequate. A nice extra for me are the 30 cards you can collect, they tell in the achievement menue about fairy tail entity, a really interesting little bonus. So for HO Games Lovers (hardcore fans of this genre) i give this game about 89 % (93 % myself because its the first Steam Game), for normal fans and/ or normal gamers 77-70 %, for people that dont like Hidden Object G. dont play it ;) Thank you for reading. Hopefully enjoy. P. S. i cant await Eventide 2

author: {'steamid': '76561198028216179', 'num_games_owned': 2423, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1454404046}
review:
Are you a fan of Slavic fairy tales? No? Well, this game might just change your mind. [i]Eventide: Slavic Fable[/i] is a game filled with magic and mystery as the hero, Mary, goes on an adventure to save her grandmother and the Slavic heritage park named Moorland that is filled with mythical creatures. This is a hidden item game with [b]many enjoyable moments.[/b]

The story starts with Mary, a botanist, getting a letter from her grandmother to rush to Moorland. Things go downhill from there as Mary gets into a car accident only to be saved, only to then witness [b]her grandmother being taken away[/b] by a giant moth-like creature! The only way she can fix things is by finding a mystical flower and rejuvenating it so that its magic can be used. The creatures of Slavic legend who live in the park aid her quest to restore peace to Moorland and save the world.

The game has many beautiful hidden object scenes to keep your attention as well as fun and sometimes challenging puzzles that you must complete to progress in the game. If you’ve played other games in this genre then you won’t be surprised, however this is a nice title for players new to hidden object games or even children. The music is very fitting. Though I found several of the mythical creatures creepy, [b]the artwork is gorgeous[/b] -the vibrant colors and attention to details made this game a pleasure to play.

The game can be on the short side, even with playing the bonus chapter. However, the game also has achievements to go after and trading cards, adding a bit more to the game. This casual title is [b]a fun and whimsical tale[/b] that is sure to please, I do recommend grabbing Eventide: Slavic Fable if you get the opportunity; beautiful art, smooth game-play, fully voiced and an overall great experience.

[url=http://lunarproductions.tumblr.com/]Lunar Productions[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198178657419', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1452, 'last_played': 1547430906}

author: {'steamid': '76561198037166965', 'num_games_owned': 1508, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1456012316}
review:
[h1] [url=http://www.contranetwork.it/eventide-slavic-fable-recensione/] Recensione Completa sul Sito Ufficiale [/url][/h1] 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yEtofvvDkKU


Spesso, ci sono dei giochi che ci sorprendono.. non tanto per il graficone o un gameplay innovativo (che poi ad oggi è difficile trovarlo) ma bensì per un insieme di cose.

Eventide: Slavic Fable, è un gioco semplicemente magico, una favola che viene raccontata attraverso enigmi, puzzle e minigiochi vari.

Il tutto viene raccontato attraverso un buon doppiaggio, con delle scene animate ben fatte e una colonna sonora che riesce a rilassarti nei momenti più calmi, e a capovolgersi totalmente in quelli più intensi!!!
Il gioco di per se non è difficile, in quanto si possono utilizzare gli aiuti per superare i vari enigmi, ma il bello del gioco sta proprio in questo, infatti in base a come giochiamo sblocchiamo degli obbiettivi specifici. Ci sono ben 3 Difficoltà, le prime due ti permettono di utilizzare gli aiuti senza penalità, mentre l’ultima quella (Esperto) oltre alle penalità non ti permette di visionare il tutorial, la mappa e gli oggetti non vengono visionati.. insomma diventa veramente bello tosto!

[h1] [url=http://www.contranetwork.it/eventide-slavic-fable-recensione/] Recensione Completa sul Sito Ufficiale [/url][/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198083656207', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1525152842}
review:
游戏的基本过程就是寻找画面中的物品进行组合搭配，解开谜题通往下一个场景来完成情节。
有时在此场景中找到的物品要在上一个乃至上上一个场景中使用，所以记性不好，或者不连续玩的时候容易忘记。不过这一代因为加入了地图，所以场景转换上十分快捷。
要说缺点就是一些道具的使用比较不合理，比如要敲开一道门，满地的锤子铁铲不可用，却要用钢锯去上上一个场景找一辆自行车，把车架锯开取得钢管来使用。不用提示很难想到。
游戏画面上，色彩对比明显，所以让整体风格看上去偏低龄化（不过这一类游戏本来就是给孩子玩的），故事也比较简单。本作的背景是斯拉夫神话，游戏里有一句话到让我很有感触。“神话生物的存在需要依靠人类的信念，新的秩序给它们带来了恐慌。”大概是建国后动物不许成精，所以我们现在也看不到那么多魑魅魍魉了吧（笑）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198210814135', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1459065286}
review:
很棒的游戏，无论是画面，还音乐，还是剧情，都很棒。
但是我在二周目的时候遇到了一些BUG，虽然这些BUG并不会说使我无法通关之类……
因为卡片差两个，花差一个，所以开了二周目，然后发现花只有落下的那朵还在，剩下的都不再显示，这是很好的事……但是卡片，以前捡过的卡片仍旧显示，而且可以点……好吧，这个不是很严重的问题，问题是我点了以前捡过的卡片，他居然算我捡到了未捡过的卡片，结果就是成就那里显示卡片是30/30，但实际上上面还空着我没捡到的那两张卡片。
以及当大场景中放大某些小场景细节，然后当这个小场景没有可操作的东西之后，小场景就会自动关闭，无法再点开。这是很好的设定，但是二周目的时候其中一些小场景没有可操作的东西之后仍旧可以点开，一周目就没有这些BUG。
希望能把这些BUG修复一下。

Like the grandma Baba, the way they got her face it looks like it's on the side of her head,  And where they have her chained up to the table at the end her arms and feet just look weird.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056487971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1454445942}
review:
Artifex mundi 배급사의 여타 다른 게임과 마찬가지로 포인트 앤 클릭 게임입니다.

숨은그림찾기가 주를 이루고, 그 외에도 20개가 넘는 미니게임들로 이루어져 있습니다.
최신작답게 그래픽과 사운드가 정말 좋습니다. 요정의 숲에 온 신비감도 들고, 주인공에 몰입도 잘 됩니다.

한글화는 되어있으나, 띄어쓰기가 엉망이라 읽기 조금 불편하실 수도 있습니다.
그리고 아주 후반으로 갈 수록 힌트를 쓰지 않고서는 길을 여러번 헤매게 되더군요.

같은 제작사의 다른 숨은그림찾기 게임에서 보여준 갑툭튀 공포 요소는 전부 사라졌으니 안심하시고, 
그냥 귀여운 동화책을 읽는 느낌으로 진행하실 수 있습니다.

무엇보다 도전과제는 '전문가 모드'로 시작해서 천천히 쭉 깨시면 1회차만에 올클 가능합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141404871', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 706, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 706, 'last_played': 1454693187}
review:
Beautiful color palette of earthy autumn tones to match an equally earthy game.  Slavic mythology centers around the hearth, the home, and the natural world.  This game does that extemely well in presentation, storyline and the creatures used, and is family friendly in theme.

Storyline: Dr. Mary Gilbert, botantist and saviour of endangered moss in Maple Creek (Maple Creek - omage to Enigmatis) has received a letter from her grandmother referred to as Baba (Yaga Baba reference) urgently requesting her help to save a rare and endangered plant in the Slavic Park, an educational outdoor museum centered around Slavic mythological creatures.  Upon arriving Mary is attacked by a creature and her car is shoved off a cliff.  Escaping the car begins the quest adventure of saving her soon to be kidnapped grandmother, meeting the mythology creatures who have taken refuge in the park, healing the rare and magical plant, and ultimately defeating the villian in an apropos way.   

Gameplay:  This game is more point and click then hidden object but plays as a combination of both.  There are basically three main areas of the game, the Slavic Park, the abandoned village and the castle with side quests into other areas.  There is a fast travel map but the player can not return to the Slavic Park once they cross the lake to the abandoned village.  So make sure all the extras finds (notes, etc and bestiary cards) are found before crossing the lake. 

Hidden Object:  The Hidden Object scenes are mostly fragmented HOs (find the pictured pieces to create a single object), find "X" amount of objects, and near the end of the game are list HO finds.  The list HOs have "ghost" puzzle pieces beneath them that the player clicks on to complete the 'extra' puzzle and the HO scene.  

Puzzles: Nothing overly challenging and a variety of basic fun fare.  Sliders, pipe puzzle, picture puzzles, codes, telescope challenge, and a maze.

There are three extra find challenges in this game:
1) 30 bright pink purplish flowers that are very hard to miss.
2) Finding all the notes, posters, pictures, diplomas, signs, etc in the main game. Note: I am unsure exactly which ones are used to gain the achievement Bookworm, so do not be shy click on everything. Some are missable so click on notes, papers, etc first before any 'quest' object.
3) Collecting the bestiary cards scattered throughout the main game.  Note: some are missable such as the one at the end of the maze since if not taken at the time the player can not return to get it later.  These cards can be accessed during gameplay and the player can read about 30 different slavic mythological creatures.  I do believe the cards must be read to gain the achievement associated with them.

Achievements:  Most are gained through gameplay alone and all achievements can be earned in a single playthrough.   

Fun game for the expert and beginner alike with three game modes to choose from.  If playing on expert mode the first time through here's a hint:  The list HO finds are found in the third part of the game (the castle and surrounding areas) these can be easy to miss so make sure to click on the background areas and places you have been before to find them. 

Well worth full price for an easy romp through slavic mythology.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105334707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1457322912}

author: {'steamid': '76561198070338031', 'num_games_owned': 405, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1454375601}
review: Beautiful and fun! Sort of a mix between Grim Legends: The Forsaken Bridge and Enigmatis: The Mists of Ravenwood (which happen to be my two favorite Artifex Mundi games). I only wish it had been longer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018625414', 'num_games_owned': 3829, 'num_reviews': 1257, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1454343975}
review:
エキストラまでクリアしたのでレビューします

実績・日本語翻訳・トレカ対応
エキスパートクリア実績あり、探しものパズル中のお助けミニゲームは無し
ゲーム中のコレクションアイテムは2種類（花とカード）

スラブが舞台のファンタジー系アドベンチャーゲームです
お祖母ちゃんが悪い奴にさらわれてしまったので孫娘になって助けに行く！
助けないとスラブの森がが大変な事に～というようなストーリーです

・良かった所
ファンタジーっぽい雰囲気が良かったです、ファンタジーっぽい感じですけど舞台は現代？
捜し物系パズルが多いかと思ったらいつもより少なめ＆絵が独特の物があって良かったです
意地悪なパズルなし
行き詰まるところは無いけれどボリュームがあった

・悪かった所
若干誤訳あり（ゲーム進行に問題なし、言葉遣いの問題程度）

感想としては久々にボリュームが有って面白かった！
カードが出るまでに1ｈ、ゲームプレイで4.2ｈでした
エキスパートクリアまで2周すれば全実績解除できると思います
コレクションアイテムを全て見落とさなければ・・・ですが
おまけのシナリオも納得のいくお話で心から楽しめました！
ゲームスタート時に2の広告が出ていたので2も早くやってみたいな～と思う作りでした
ファンタジー系やケモ耳好きな人におすすめです

author: {'steamid': '76561198181067817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1454207997}
review:

While I completed the game in 4 hours and taking my time, there are other modes to try the game on. I'll certainly be going through it again on expert mode for the fun of it.

Id recommend this game and will be trying others from this company in the future.
